description.zh: 中华人民共和国,简称中国,是位于东亚的社会主义国家,也是世界上人口最多的国家。中国拥有五千年悠久历史和灿烂文化,是世界四大文明古国之一。
description.en: The People's Republic of China, commonly known as China, is a socialist country located in East Asia and the world's most populous nation. China has a rich history spanning 5,000 years and is one of the world's four ancient civilizations.

zh: 中国是世界上最早发明纸张、火药、指南针和印刷术的国家
长城总长度超过21,000公里,是世界上最长的人造建筑
中国有56个民族,汉族占总人口的91%以上
en: China invented paper, gunpowder, the compass, and printing
The Great Wall stretches over 21,000 km, the longest man-made structure
China has 56 ethnic groups, with Han Chinese comprising over 91% of the population

description.zh: 美利坚合众国,简称美国,是位于北美洲的联邦共和制国家,由50个州和华盛顿哥伦比亚特区组成。美国是世界上最大的经济体和军事强国。
description.en: The United States of America is a federal republic in North America, consisting of 50 states and Washington, D.C. The U.S. is the world's largest economy and military power.

zh: 美国国旗上的50颗星代表50个州,13条条纹代表最初的13个殖民地
美国是世界上第三大国家,仅次于俄罗斯和加拿大
美元是世界上使用最广泛的货币
en: The 50 stars on the US flag represent the 50 states, and the 13 stripes represent the original 13 colonies
The US is the world's third-largest country by area, after Russia and Canada
The US dollar is the most widely used currency in the world

description.zh: 日本国,简称日本,是位于东亚的岛国,由四个主要岛屿和数千个小岛组成。日本是世界第三大经济体,以其先进的科技和独特的文化闻名于世。
description.en: Japan is an island country in East Asia, consisting of four main islands and thousands of smaller ones. It is the world's third-largest economy, renowned for its advanced technology and unique culture.

zh: 日本国旗被称为'日章旗',红色圆形代表太阳
日本是世界上预期寿命最长的国家之一
日本拥有超过6,800座岛屿
en: Japan's flag is called 'Hinomaru', with the red circle representing the sun
Japan has one of the highest life expectancies in the world
Japan consists of over 6,800 islands

description.zh: 大不列颠及北爱尔兰联合王国,简称英国,是位于欧洲西北部的岛国。英国是世界上第一个工业化国家,在历史上曾建立了世界上最大的殖民帝国。
description.en: The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland is an island country in northwestern Europe. The UK was the world's first industrialized nation and once established the largest colonial empire in history.

zh: 英国国旗被称为'米字旗'或'联合杰克',由英格兰、苏格兰和北爱尔兰的旗帜组合而成
伦敦是世界上最古老的地铁系统所在地
英语是世界上使用最广泛的第二语言
en: The UK flag is called the 'Union Jack', combining the flags of England, Scotland, and Northern Ireland
London is home to the world's oldest underground railway system
English is the most widely spoken second language in the world

description.zh: 法兰西共和国,简称法国,是位于西欧的共和制国家。法国是世界上最受欢迎的旅游目的地,以其艺术、文化、美食和时尚闻名于世。
description.en: The French Republic, commonly known as France, is a republic in Western Europe. France is the world's most popular tourist destination, renowned for its art, culture, cuisine, and fashion.

zh: 法国国旗被称为'三色旗',蓝白红三色代表自由、平等、博爱
埃菲尔铁塔是世界上参观人数最多的付费纪念碑
法国拥有世界上最多的诺贝尔文学奖得主
en: The French flag is called the 'Tricolore', with blue, white, and red representing liberty, equality, and fraternity
The Eiffel Tower is the most-visited paid monument in the world
France has the most Nobel Prize winners in Literature

description.zh: 德意志联邦共和国,简称德国,是位于中欧的联邦议会共和制国家。德国是欧洲最大经济体,在科技、工程和制造业方面处于世界领先地位。
description.en: The Federal Republic of Germany is a federal parliamentary republic in Central Europe. Germany is Europe's largest economy and a world leader in technology, engineering, and manufacturing.

zh: 德国国旗的黑红金三色源于19世纪的德国统一运动
德国拥有世界上最发达的高速公路系统之一,部分路段不限速
德国是世界上最大的啤酒生产国之一,每年举办慕尼黑啤酒节
en: The black-red-gold colors of Germany's flag originated from 19th-century unification movements
Germany has one of the world's most advanced highway systems, with some sections having no speed limit
Germany is one of the world's largest beer producers, hosting the famous Oktoberfest annually

description.zh: 印度共和国,简称印度,是位于南亚的联邦议会制共和国。印度是世界第二人口大国,拥有悠久的历史文化和多元的宗教传统。
description.en: The Republic of India is a federal parliamentary republic in South Asia. India is the world's second-most populous country with a rich history and diverse religious traditions.

zh: 印度国旗中央的轮子是阿育王法轮,有24根辐条
印度是世界上最大的民主国家
印度有22种官方语言和数百种地方语言
en: The wheel in India's flag is the Ashoka Chakra with 24 spokes
India is the world's largest democracy
India has 22 official languages and hundreds of local languages

description.zh: 巴西联邦共和国,简称巴西,是南美洲最大的国家。巴西拥有世界上最大的热带雨林——亚马逊雨林,被誉为'地球之肺'。
description.en: The Federative Republic of Brazil is the largest country in South America. Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the world's largest tropical rainforest, known as the 'lungs of the Earth'.

zh: 巴西国旗上的27颗星代表26个州和1个联邦区
巴西是世界上最大的咖啡生产国
巴西狂欢节是世界上最大的节日庆典之一
en: The 27 stars on Brazil's flag represent 26 states and 1 federal district
Brazil is the world's largest coffee producer
Brazil's Carnival is one of the world's largest festival celebrations

description.zh: 加拿大,是位于北美洲北部的联邦制国家。加拿大是世界上面积第二大的国家,以其壮丽的自然风光和多元文化著称。
description.en: Canada is a federal state in northern North America. It is the world's second-largest country by area, known for its stunning natural landscapes and multiculturalism.

zh: 加拿大国旗上的枫叶是国家的象征
加拿大拥有世界上最长的海岸线
加拿大是世界上教育程度最高的国家之一
en: The maple leaf on Canada's flag is a national symbol
Canada has the world's longest coastline
Canada is one of the world's most educated countries

description.zh: 澳大利亚联邦,简称澳大利亚,是位于大洋洲的联邦制君主立宪制国家。澳大利亚拥有独特的生态系统和众多特有物种。
description.en: The Commonwealth of Australia is a federal constitutional monarchy in Oceania. Australia has unique ecosystems and many endemic species.

zh: 澳大利亚国旗上的南十字星座代表其南半球位置
澳大利亚是世界上唯一占据整个大陆的国家
大堡礁是世界上最大的珊瑚礁系统
en: The Southern Cross constellation on Australia's flag represents its Southern Hemisphere location
Australia is the only country that occupies an entire continent
The Great Barrier Reef is the world's largest coral reef system

description.zh: 俄罗斯联邦,简称俄罗斯,是世界上面积最大的国家,横跨欧亚大陆。俄罗斯拥有丰富的自然资源和悠久的历史文化。
description.en: The Russian Federation is the world's largest country by area, spanning Europe and Asia. Russia has abundant natural resources and a rich historical culture.

zh: 俄罗斯国旗的白蓝红三色代表东正教传统
俄罗斯横跨11个时区
西伯利亚铁路是世界上最长的铁路线
en: The white-blue-red colors of Russia's flag represent Orthodox Christian tradition
Russia spans 11 time zones
The Trans-Siberian Railway is the world's longest railway line

description.zh: 大韩民国,简称韩国,是位于东亚朝鲜半岛南部的共和制国家。韩国是全球重要的科技和文化输出国,以半导体、汽车和流行文化闻名。
description.en: The Republic of Korea, commonly known as South Korea, is a republic in the southern part of the Korean Peninsula in East Asia. South Korea is a major global exporter of technology and culture, known for semiconductors, automobiles, and pop culture.

zh: 韩国国旗太极旗中央的太极图代表宇宙的和谐
韩国是世界上互联网速度最快的国家之一
韩流(K-pop)文化在全球拥有数亿粉丝
en: The Taegeuk (yin-yang) in South Korea's flag represents cosmic harmony
South Korea has one of the fastest internet speeds in the world
Korean Wave (K-pop) culture has hundreds of millions of fans globally

description.zh: 意大利共和国,简称意大利,是位于南欧的议会制共和国。意大利是文艺复兴的发源地,拥有世界上最多的世界文化遗产。
description.en: The Italian Republic is a parliamentary republic in Southern Europe. Italy is the birthplace of the Renaissance and has the most UNESCO World Heritage Sites in the world.

zh: 意大利国旗的绿白红三色代表希望、信念和博爱
意大利拥有55处联合国教科文组织世界遗产
披萨和意大利面是意大利对世界美食的重要贡献
en: The green-white-red colors of Italy's flag represent hope, faith, and charity
Italy has 55 UNESCO World Heritage Sites
Pizza and pasta are Italy's major contributions to world cuisine

description.zh: 墨西哥合众国,简称墨西哥,是位于北美洲南部的联邦共和国。墨西哥是古代玛雅和阿兹特克文明的发源地,拥有丰富的文化遗产。
description.en: The United Mexican States, commonly known as Mexico, is a federal republic in southern North America. Mexico is the birthplace of ancient Mayan and Aztec civilizations with rich cultural heritage.

zh: 墨西哥国旗中央的图案是一只鹰站在仙人掌上吃蛇
墨西哥是世界上最大的西班牙语国家
墨西哥的亡灵节是联合国非物质文化遗产
en: The center of Mexico's flag shows an eagle perched on a cactus eating a snake
Mexico is the world's largest Spanish-speaking country
Mexico's Day of the Dead is a UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage

description.zh: 印度尼西亚共和国,简称印尼,是位于东南亚的群岛国家,由17,000多个岛屿组成。印尼是世界上最大的群岛国家和最大的穆斯林人口国家。
description.en: The Republic of Indonesia is an archipelagic country in Southeast Asia, consisting of over 17,000 islands. Indonesia is the world's largest archipelago and the country with the largest Muslim population.

zh: 印尼国旗的红白两色象征勇气和纯洁
印尼拥有世界上最多的活火山
科莫多龙是印尼特有的世界上最大的蜥蜴
en: The red and white colors of Indonesia's flag symbolize courage and purity
Indonesia has the most active volcanoes in the world
The Komodo dragon, the world's largest lizard, is endemic to Indonesia

description.zh: 土耳其共和国,简称土耳其,是横跨欧亚两洲的国家。土耳其是古代东罗马帝国和奥斯曼帝国的继承者,拥有深厚的历史文化底蕴。
description.en: The Republic of Turkey is a transcontinental country spanning Europe and Asia. Turkey is the successor to the Byzantine and Ottoman Empires with deep historical and cultural heritage.

zh: 土耳其国旗上的新月和星星是伊斯兰文化的象征
伊斯坦布尔是世界上唯一横跨两大洲的城市
土耳其是世界上最大的榛子生产国
en: The crescent and star on Turkey's flag are symbols of Islamic culture
Istanbul is the only city in the world that spans two continents
Turkey is the world's largest producer of hazelnuts

description.zh: 沙特阿拉伯王国,简称沙特,是位于西亚阿拉伯半岛的君主制国家。沙特是伊斯兰教的诞生地,拥有麦加和麦地那两大圣城。
description.en: The Kingdom of Saudi Arabia is a monarchy on the Arabian Peninsula in Western Asia. Saudi Arabia is the birthplace of Islam and home to the holy cities of Mecca and Medina.

zh: 沙特国旗上的阿拉伯文是伊斯兰教信仰宣言
沙特是世界上最大的石油出口国
每年有数百万穆斯林前往麦加朝觐
en: The Arabic script on Saudi Arabia's flag is the Islamic declaration of faith
Saudi Arabia is the world's largest oil exporter
Millions of Muslims make the pilgrimage to Mecca annually

description.zh: 阿根廷共和国,简称阿根廷,是位于南美洲南部的联邦共和国。阿根廷拥有丰富的自然资源和多元的文化,是拉丁美洲重要国家之一。
description.en: The Argentine Republic is a federal republic in southern South America. Argentina has abundant natural resources and diverse culture, and is one of Latin America's major countries.

zh: 阿根廷国旗上的太阳被称为'五月太阳',纪念独立运动
阿根廷是探戈舞的发源地
阿根廷足球队曾多次赢得世界杯冠军
en: The sun on Argentina's flag is called the 'Sun of May', commemorating independence
Argentina is the birthplace of tango dance
Argentina's football team has won multiple World Cup championships

capital.zh: 比勒陀利亚、开普敦、布隆方丹

description.zh: 南非共和国,简称南非,是位于非洲最南端的共和国。南非是非洲工业化程度最高的国家,拥有丰富的矿产资源和独特的野生动物。
description.en: The Republic of South Africa is a republic at the southern tip of Africa. South Africa is Africa's most industrialized country with rich mineral resources and unique wildlife.

zh: 南非国旗融合了六种颜色,象征国家的多元文化
南非拥有三个首都,分别负责行政、立法和司法
南非是世界上生物多样性最丰富的国家之一
en: South Africa's flag combines six colors, symbolizing the nation's diversity
South Africa has three capitals for administrative, legislative, and judicial functions
South Africa is one of the world's most biodiverse countries

description.zh: 阿拉伯埃及共和国,简称埃及,是位于北非的共和国。埃及是世界四大文明古国之一,以金字塔和古埃及文明闻名于世。
description.en: The Arab Republic of Egypt is a republic in North Africa. Egypt is one of the world's four ancient civilizations, famous for its pyramids and ancient Egyptian civilization.

zh: 埃及国旗上的金鹰是萨拉丁之鹰,象征力量
吉萨大金字塔是古代世界七大奇迹中唯一现存的
尼罗河是世界上最长的河流之一
en: The golden eagle on Egypt's flag is the Eagle of Saladin, symbolizing strength
The Great Pyramid of Giza is the only surviving ancient wonder of the world
The Nile is one of the world's longest rivers

description.zh: 西班牙王国,简称西班牙,是位于欧洲西南部伊比利亚半岛的君主立宪制国家。西班牙曾是世界上最强大的殖民帝国之一,对拉丁美洲文化影响深远。
description.en: The Kingdom of Spain is a constitutional monarchy on the Iberian Peninsula in southwestern Europe. Spain was once one of the world's most powerful colonial empires with profound influence on Latin American culture.

zh: 西班牙国旗上的国徽包含了历史上各王国的标志
西班牙语是世界上第二大母语
西班牙的弗拉明戈舞是联合国非物质文化遗产
en: Spain's coat of arms on the flag includes symbols of historical kingdoms
Spanish is the world's second most spoken native language
Spanish flamenco dance is a UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage

description.zh: 泰王国,简称泰国,是位于东南亚中南半岛的君主立宪制国家。泰国以其美丽的海滩、丰富的文化和热情好客的人民而闻名。
description.en: The Kingdom of Thailand is a constitutional monarchy on the Indochinese Peninsula in Southeast Asia. Thailand is known for its beautiful beaches, rich culture, and hospitable people.

zh: 泰国国旗的五条横纹代表国家、宗教和国王
泰国是世界上唯一未被西方殖民的东南亚国家
泰式按摩是联合国非物质文化遗产
en: The five horizontal stripes on Thailand's flag represent the nation, religion, and king
Thailand is the only Southeast Asian country never colonized by Western powers
Thai massage is a UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage

description.zh: 荷兰王国,通称荷兰,是位于西欧的君主立宪制国家。荷兰以风车、郁金香和运河闻名,是世界上最自由和宽容的国家之一。
description.en: The Kingdom of the Netherlands is a constitutional monarchy in Western Europe. The Netherlands is famous for windmills, tulips, and canals, and is one of the world's most liberal and tolerant countries.

zh: 荷兰国旗是世界上最古老的三色旗之一
荷兰约四分之一的国土低于海平面
阿姆斯特丹有超过1,200座桥梁,比威尼斯还多
en: The Dutch flag is one of the oldest tricolor flags in the world
About a quarter of the Netherlands is below sea level
Amsterdam has over 1,200 bridges, more than Venice

description.zh: 瑞士联邦,简称瑞士,是位于中欧的联邦制国家。瑞士以其中立政策、精密制造业和银行业闻名于世。
description.en: The Swiss Confederation is a federal state in Central Europe. Switzerland is renowned for its neutrality policy, precision manufacturing, and banking industry.

zh: 瑞士国旗是世界上仅有的两个正方形国旗之一
瑞士拥有世界上最长的铁路隧道
瑞士巧克力和瑞士手表享誉全球
en: Switzerland's flag is one of only two square national flags in the world
Switzerland has the world's longest railway tunnel
Swiss chocolate and Swiss watches are world-famous

description.zh: 瑞典王国,简称瑞典,是位于北欧斯堪的纳维亚半岛的君主立宪制国家。瑞典以其高福利社会制度和创新能力著称。
description.en: The Kingdom of Sweden is a constitutional monarchy on the Scandinavian Peninsula in Northern Europe. Sweden is known for its high-welfare social system and innovation capacity.

zh: 瑞典国旗的蓝底金十字是北欧十字旗的代表
瑞典是诺贝尔奖的故乡
宜家(IKEA)和沃尔沃都来自瑞典
en: Sweden's blue and gold Nordic cross flag is iconic
Sweden is the home of the Nobel Prize
IKEA and Volvo both originated in Sweden

description.zh: 挪威王国,简称挪威,是位于北欧斯堪的纳维亚半岛西部的君主立宪制国家。挪威以其壮丽的峡湾景观和丰富的石油资源闻名。
description.en: The Kingdom of Norway is a constitutional monarchy in western Scandinavia. Norway is famous for its spectacular fjord landscapes and abundant oil resources.

zh: 挪威国旗也采用了北欧十字设计
挪威是世界上人均GDP最高的国家之一
挪威峡湾被列入世界自然遗产
en: Norway's flag also features the Nordic cross design
Norway has one of the highest GDP per capita in the world
Norwegian fjords are UNESCO World Heritage sites

description.zh: 丹麦王国,简称丹麦,是位于北欧的君主立宪制国家。丹麦是世界上最幸福的国家之一,以其童话故事和现代设计著称。
description.en: The Kingdom of Denmark is a constitutional monarchy in Northern Europe. Denmark is one of the world's happiest countries, famous for fairy tales and modern design.

zh: 丹麦国旗Dannebrog是世界上最古老的仍在使用的国旗
安徒生童话诞生于丹麦
乐高积木是丹麦的发明
en: Denmark's Dannebrog is the oldest continuously used national flag
Hans Christian Andersen's fairy tales originated in Denmark
LEGO was invented in Denmark

description.zh: 芬兰共和国,简称芬兰,是位于北欧的议会制共和国。芬兰以其优质的教育系统、桑拿文化和北极光闻名。
description.en: The Republic of Finland is a parliamentary republic in Northern Europe. Finland is renowned for its excellent education system, sauna culture, and northern lights.

zh: 芬兰国旗采用蓝色北欧十字,象征湖泊和天空
芬兰的教育系统被认为是世界上最好的
圣诞老人的故乡在芬兰的拉普兰
en: Finland's flag features a blue Nordic cross symbolizing lakes and sky
Finland's education system is considered the world's best
Santa Claus's hometown is in Finnish Lapland

description.zh: 波兰共和国,简称波兰,是位于中欧的共和制国家。波兰拥有悠久的历史和丰富的文化遗产,是欧洲重要的经济体之一。
description.en: The Republic of Poland is a republic in Central Europe. Poland has a long history and rich cultural heritage, and is one of Europe's major economies.

zh: 波兰国旗的白红两色源于国徽中的白鹰
居里夫人和肖邦都出生于波兰
波兰的奥斯威辛集中营是重要的历史遗址
en: Poland's white and red flag colors come from the white eagle on its coat of arms
Marie Curie and Chopin were both born in Poland
Auschwitz concentration camp in Poland is a significant historical site

description.zh: 葡萄牙共和国,简称葡萄牙,是位于欧洲西南部伊比利亚半岛的共和制国家。葡萄牙曾是大航海时代的先驱,对世界历史产生了深远影响。
description.en: The Portuguese Republic is a republic on the Iberian Peninsula in southwestern Europe. Portugal was a pioneer of the Age of Discovery and had a profound impact on world history.

zh: 葡萄牙国旗上的仪器是浑天仪,象征航海时代
葡萄牙语是世界第六大语言
葡萄牙的波尔图酒和蛋挞世界闻名
en: The armillary sphere on Portugal's flag symbolizes the Age of Discovery
Portuguese is the world's sixth most spoken language
Portugal's Port wine and Pastel de Nata are world-famous

description.zh: 希腊共和国,简称希腊,是位于欧洲东南部的共和制国家。希腊是西方文明的发源地,拥有悠久的历史和灿烂的古代文化。
description.en: The Hellenic Republic, commonly known as Greece, is a republic in southeastern Europe. Greece is the cradle of Western civilization with a long history and brilliant ancient culture.

zh: 希腊国旗的蓝白条纹代表海洋和天空
奥林匹克运动会起源于古希腊
希腊拥有超过6,000个岛屿
en: The blue and white stripes on Greece's flag represent the sea and sky
The Olympic Games originated in ancient Greece
Greece has over 6,000 islands

description.zh: 奥地利共和国,简称奥地利,是位于中欧的内陆国家。奥地利以其音乐传统、阿尔卑斯山景观和历史文化遗产著称。
description.en: The Republic of Austria is a landlocked country in Central Europe. Austria is renowned for its musical tradition, Alpine landscapes, and historical cultural heritage.

zh: 奥地利国旗是世界上最古老的国旗之一
莫扎特、海顿和施特劳斯都来自奥地利
维也纳连续多年被评为世界最宜居城市
en: Austria's flag is one of the oldest in the world
Mozart, Haydn, and Strauss all came from Austria
Vienna has been rated the world's most livable city for many years

description.zh: 比利时王国,简称比利时,是位于西欧的君主立宪制国家。比利时是欧盟和北约的总部所在地,被称为'欧洲的心脏'。
description.en: The Kingdom of Belgium is a constitutional monarchy in Western Europe. Belgium hosts EU and NATO headquarters and is called the 'Heart of Europe'.

zh: 比利时国旗的黑黄红三色源于布拉班特公国
比利时巧克力和华夫饼世界闻名
布鲁塞尔有超过800种啤酒
en: Belgium's black-yellow-red flag colors come from the Duchy of Brabant
Belgian chocolate and waffles are world-famous
Brussels has over 800 types of beer

description.zh: 爱尔兰,是位于欧洲西部的岛国。爱尔兰被称为'翡翠岛',以其绿色景观、凯尔特文化和文学传统闻名。
description.en: Ireland is an island country in western Europe. Known as the 'Emerald Isle', Ireland is famous for its green landscapes, Celtic culture, and literary tradition.

zh: 爱尔兰国旗的绿白橙三色象征和平与统一
圣帕特里克节起源于爱尔兰
爱尔兰产生了四位诺贝尔文学奖得主
en: Ireland's green-white-orange flag symbolizes peace and unity
St. Patrick's Day originated in Ireland
Ireland has produced four Nobel Prize winners in Literature

description.zh: 捷克共和国,简称捷克,是位于中欧的内陆国家。捷克以其美丽的中世纪城镇、啤酒文化和丰富的历史遗产著称。
description.en: The Czech Republic is a landlocked country in Central Europe. The Czech Republic is known for its beautiful medieval towns, beer culture, and rich historical heritage.

zh: 捷克国旗与菲律宾国旗相似,但含义不同
捷克是世界上人均啤酒消费量最高的国家
布拉格被称为'千塔之城'
en: The Czech flag is similar to the Philippine flag but with different meaning
Czech Republic has the highest beer consumption per capita in the world
Prague is called the 'City of a Hundred Spires'

description.zh: 罗马尼亚,是位于东南欧的共和制国家。罗马尼亚以其喀尔巴阡山脉、黑海海岸和德古拉传说闻名。
description.en: Romania is a republic in Southeastern Europe. Romania is known for its Carpathian Mountains, Black Sea coast, and Dracula legend.

zh: 罗马尼亚国旗与乍得国旗几乎相同
德古拉城堡位于罗马尼亚的特兰西瓦尼亚
罗马尼亚拥有欧洲最大的熊群
en: Romania's flag is nearly identical to Chad's flag
Dracula's Castle is in Transylvania, Romania
Romania has Europe's largest bear population

description.zh: 乌克兰,是位于东欧的共和制国家。乌克兰是欧洲面积第二大的国家,拥有肥沃的黑土地,被称为'欧洲粮仓'。
description.en: Ukraine is a republic in Eastern Europe. Ukraine is Europe's second-largest country by area with fertile black soil, known as the 'Breadbasket of Europe'.

zh: 乌克兰国旗的蓝黄两色代表蓝天和麦田
切尔诺贝利核电站位于乌克兰
乌克兰是世界第五大小麦出口国
en: Ukraine's blue and yellow flag represents blue sky and wheat fields
The Chernobyl nuclear power plant is located in Ukraine
Ukraine is the world's fifth-largest wheat exporter

description.zh: 匈牙利,是位于中欧的内陆国家。匈牙利以其温泉文化、美丽的多瑙河畔景观和独特的马扎尔文化著称。
description.en: Hungary is a landlocked country in Central Europe. Hungary is known for its thermal bath culture, beautiful Danube riverside scenery, and unique Magyar culture.

zh: 匈牙利国旗的红白绿三色代表力量、忠诚和希望
布达佩斯拥有世界上最大的温泉系统
魔方是匈牙利人发明的
en: Hungary's red-white-green flag represents strength, fidelity, and hope
Budapest has the world's largest thermal water cave system
The Rubik's Cube was invented by a Hungarian

language.zh: 英语、华语、马来语、泰米尔语

description.zh: 新加坡共和国,简称新加坡,是位于东南亚的城市国家。新加坡是全球最重要的金融中心之一,以其高效的政府管理和清廉著称。
description.en: The Republic of Singapore is a city-state in Southeast Asia. Singapore is one of the world's most important financial centers, known for its efficient government and low corruption.

zh: 新加坡国旗的新月代表新兴国家,五颗星代表民主、和平等理想
新加坡是世界上最小的国家之一,但却是亚洲四小龙之一
新加坡樟宜机场连续多年被评为世界最佳机场
en: Singapore's crescent moon represents an emerging nation, and the five stars represent ideals like democracy and peace
Singapore is one of the world's smallest countries but one of Asia's Four Tigers
Singapore Changi Airport has been rated the world's best airport for many years

description.zh: 马来西亚,是位于东南亚的联邦制君主立宪制国家。马来西亚由马来半岛和婆罗洲北部组成,拥有多元的文化和丰富的自然资源。
description.en: Malaysia is a federal constitutional monarchy in Southeast Asia. Malaysia consists of the Malay Peninsula and northern Borneo, with diverse cultures and rich natural resources.

zh: 马来西亚国旗的14道红白条纹代表13个州和联邦政府
吉隆坡的双子塔曾是世界最高的双塔建筑
马来西亚是世界上最大的棕榈油生产国
en: Malaysia's 14 red and white stripes represent 13 states and the federal government
Kuala Lumpur's Petronas Twin Towers were once the world's tallest twin buildings
Malaysia is the world's largest palm oil producer

description.zh: 菲律宾共和国,简称菲律宾,是位于西太平洋的群岛国家,由7,000多个岛屿组成。菲律宾是亚洲唯一以天主教为主的国家。
description.en: The Republic of the Philippines is an archipelagic country in the western Pacific Ocean, consisting of over 7,000 islands. The Philippines is Asia's only predominantly Catholic country.

zh: 菲律宾国旗的太阳有8道光芒,代表最早起义的8个省
菲律宾人是世界上最热情好客的民族之一
菲律宾拥有世界上最小的火山和最小的灵长类动物
en: The sun on the Philippine flag has 8 rays representing the first 8 provinces to revolt
Filipinos are among the world's most hospitable people
The Philippines has the world's smallest volcano and smallest primate

description.zh: 越南社会主义共和国,简称越南,是位于东南亚中南半岛东部的社会主义国家。越南拥有狭长的海岸线和丰富的文化遗产。
description.en: The Socialist Republic of Vietnam is a socialist country in eastern Indochina. Vietnam has a long coastline and rich cultural heritage.

zh: 越南国旗的金星代表工人、农民、士兵、知识分子和青年五个阶级
越南咖啡产量居世界第二位
下龙湾是世界自然遗产,拥有数千座石灰岩岛屿
en: The golden star on Vietnam's flag represents five classes: workers, farmers, soldiers, intellectuals, and youth
Vietnam is the world's second-largest coffee producer
Ha Long Bay is a UNESCO World Heritage site with thousands of limestone islands

description.zh: 巴基斯坦伊斯兰共和国,简称巴基斯坦,是位于南亚的伊斯兰共和国。巴基斯坦是世界第五人口大国,拥有悠久的印度河流域文明。
description.en: The Islamic Republic of Pakistan is an Islamic republic in South Asia. Pakistan is the world's fifth-most populous country with ancient Indus Valley civilization.

zh: 巴基斯坦国旗的新月和星星是伊斯兰的象征
喀喇昆仑公路是世界上海拔最高的国际公路
巴基斯坦拥有世界第二高峰乔戈里峰(K2)
en: The crescent and star on Pakistan's flag are symbols of Islam
The Karakoram Highway is the world's highest international road
Pakistan has K2, the world's second-highest mountain

description.zh: 孟加拉人民共和国,简称孟加拉国,是位于南亚的共和制国家。孟加拉国是世界上人口密度最高的国家之一,拥有世界上最大的三角洲。
description.en: The People's Republic of Bangladesh is a republic in South Asia. Bangladesh is one of the world's most densely populated countries with the world's largest delta.

zh: 孟加拉国国旗的红色圆形代表太阳和为独立牺牲的烈士
孟加拉国是世界上最大的黄麻生产国
孟加拉湾的红树林是世界上最大的红树林之一
en: The red circle on Bangladesh's flag represents the sun and martyrs of independence
Bangladesh is the world's largest jute producer
The Sundarbans mangrove forest in Bangladesh is one of the world's largest

description.zh: 以色列国,简称以色列,是位于西亚的犹太国家。以色列是中东地区唯一的发达国家,以其高科技产业和创新能力闻名。
description.en: The State of Israel is a Jewish state in Western Asia. Israel is the only developed country in the Middle East, known for its high-tech industry and innovation.

zh: 以色列国旗的大卫之星是犹太教的象征
以色列是世界上人均创业公司最多的国家
死海是地球上最低的陆地点
en: The Star of David on Israel's flag is a symbol of Judaism
Israel has the most startups per capita in the world
The Dead Sea is the lowest point on Earth's land surface

description.zh: 阿拉伯联合酋长国,简称阿联酋,是位于阿拉伯半岛东部的联邦制君主国。阿联酋以其丰富的石油资源和现代化城市迪拜、阿布扎比闻名。
description.en: The United Arab Emirates is a federal monarchy on the eastern Arabian Peninsula. The UAE is known for its abundant oil resources and modern cities like Dubai and Abu Dhabi.

zh: 阿联酋国旗的四种颜色代表阿拉伯统一
迪拜的哈利法塔是世界上最高的建筑
阿联酋拥有世界上最豪华的酒店之一——帆船酒店
en: The four colors of the UAE flag represent Arab unity
Dubai's Burj Khalifa is the world's tallest building
The UAE has one of the world's most luxurious hotels, the Burj Al Arab

description.zh: 伊朗伊斯兰共和国,简称伊朗,是位于西亚的伊斯兰共和国。伊朗是世界上最古老的文明之一,古波斯帝国的继承者,拥有丰富的历史文化遗产。
description.en: The Islamic Republic of Iran is an Islamic republic in Western Asia. Iran is one of the world's oldest civilizations, successor to the ancient Persian Empire, with rich historical and cultural heritage.

zh: 伊朗国旗中央的图案是真主的文字艺术设计
波斯波利斯遗址是古波斯帝国的都城遗迹
伊朗是世界上最大的藏红花生产国
en: The central emblem on Iran's flag is a stylized word for Allah
Persepolis is the ruins of the ancient Persian Empire's capital
Iran is the world's largest saffron producer

description.zh: 伊拉克共和国,简称伊拉克,是位于西亚两河流域的共和国。伊拉克是世界上最古老的文明之一,美索不达米亚文明的发源地。
description.en: The Republic of Iraq is a republic in Mesopotamia in Western Asia. Iraq is one of the world's oldest civilizations, the birthplace of Mesopotamian civilization.

zh: 伊拉克国旗上的'真主至大'用库法体书写
巴比伦空中花园曾是古代世界七大奇迹之一
底格里斯河和幼发拉底河孕育了人类最早的文明
en: 'God is Great' on Iraq's flag is written in Kufic script
The Hanging Gardens of Babylon were one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World
The Tigris and Euphrates rivers nurtured humanity's earliest civilizations

description.zh: 尼日利亚联邦共和国,简称尼日利亚,是位于西非的联邦共和国。尼日利亚是非洲人口最多的国家,也是非洲最大的经济体。
description.en: The Federal Republic of Nigeria is a federal republic in West Africa. Nigeria is Africa's most populous country and largest economy.

zh: 尼日利亚国旗的绿白绿三色代表农业和和平
尼日利亚的诺莱坞电影产业仅次于好莱坞和宝莱坞
尼日利亚拥有250多个民族
en: Nigeria's green-white-green flag represents agriculture and peace
Nigeria's Nollywood film industry is second only to Hollywood and Bollywood
Nigeria has over 250 ethnic groups

description.zh: 埃塞俄比亚联邦民主共和国,简称埃塞俄比亚,是位于非洲东北部的内陆国家。埃塞俄比亚是非洲最古老的国家之一,拥有三千年历史。
description.en: The Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia is a landlocked country in northeastern Africa. Ethiopia is one of Africa's oldest countries with 3,000 years of history.

zh: 埃塞俄比亚国旗的星星代表国家的多样性和统一
埃塞俄比亚是咖啡的发源地
埃塞俄比亚是非洲唯一未被殖民的国家
en: The star on Ethiopia's flag represents the nation's diversity and unity
Ethiopia is the birthplace of coffee
Ethiopia is the only African country never colonized

description.zh: 肯尼亚共和国,简称肯尼亚,是位于东非的共和国。肯尼亚以其丰富的野生动物资源和马赛马拉大草原闻名于世。
description.en: The Republic of Kenya is a republic in East Africa. Kenya is world-famous for its abundant wildlife and the Masai Mara savanna.

zh: 肯尼亚国旗中央的盾牌和长矛代表国家防卫
肯尼亚的马拉河是动物大迁徙的重要地点
肯尼亚长跑运动员在国际比赛中屡获佳绩
en: The shield and spears in Kenya's flag center represent national defense
Kenya's Mara River is a key location for the Great Migration
Kenyan long-distance runners excel in international competitions

description.zh: 阿尔及利亚民主人民共和国,简称阿尔及利亚,是位于北非的共和国。阿尔及利亚是非洲面积最大的国家,大部分领土为撒哈拉沙漠。
description.en: The People's Democratic Republic of Algeria is a republic in North Africa. Algeria is Africa's largest country by area, with most of its territory in the Sahara Desert.

zh: 阿尔及利亚国旗的新月和星星是伊斯兰的象征
阿尔及利亚拥有七处世界文化遗产
撒哈拉沙漠占阿尔及利亚国土面积的80%以上
en: The crescent and star on Algeria's flag are symbols of Islam
Algeria has seven UNESCO World Heritage sites
The Sahara Desert covers over 80% of Algeria's territory

description.zh: 智利共和国,简称智利,是位于南美洲西南部的共和国。智利是世界上最狭长的国家,东临安第斯山脉,西濒太平洋。
description.en: The Republic of Chile is a republic in southwestern South America. Chile is the world's longest and narrowest country, bordered by the Andes Mountains to the east and the Pacific Ocean to the west.

zh: 智利国旗的白星代表进步和荣誉
智利拥有世界上最干燥的沙漠——阿塔卡马沙漠
复活节岛的摩艾石像是智利的著名景观
en: The white star on Chile's flag represents progress and honor
Chile has the world's driest desert, the Atacama Desert
Easter Island's Moai statues are a famous Chilean landmark

description.zh: 哥伦比亚共和国,简称哥伦比亚,是位于南美洲西北部的共和国。哥伦比亚是世界上生物多样性第二丰富的国家,拥有丰富的咖啡和翡翠资源。
description.en: The Republic of Colombia is a republic in northwestern South America. Colombia is the world's second most biodiverse country with abundant coffee and emerald resources.

zh: 哥伦比亚国旗的黄色代表黄金,蓝色代表海洋,红色代表独立战争
哥伦比亚是世界上最大的祖母绿生产国
哥伦比亚咖啡是世界上最好的咖啡之一
en: Yellow on Colombia's flag represents gold, blue the ocean, and red the wars of independence
Colombia is the world's largest emerald producer
Colombian coffee is among the world's finest

description.zh: 秘鲁共和国,简称秘鲁,是位于南美洲西部的共和国。秘鲁是古印加帝国的所在地,拥有马丘比丘等世界著名遗迹。
description.en: The Republic of Peru is a republic in western South America. Peru was home to the ancient Inca Empire and has world-famous sites like Machu Picchu.

zh: 秘鲁国旗的红白两色代表爱国和和平
马丘比丘是世界新七大奇迹之一
秘鲁的纳斯卡线条至今仍是未解之谜
en: Red and white on Peru's flag represent patriotism and peace
Machu Picchu is one of the New Seven Wonders of the World
Peru's Nazca Lines remain a mystery to this day

description.zh: 委内瑞拉玻利瓦尔共和国,简称委内瑞拉,是位于南美洲北部的共和国。委内瑞拉拥有世界上最大的石油储量和最高的瀑布——天使瀑布。
description.en: The Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela is a republic in northern South America. Venezuela has the world's largest oil reserves and the world's highest waterfall, Angel Falls.

zh: 委内瑞拉国旗的八颗星代表独立时的八个省份
天使瀑布落差达979米,是世界最高瀑布
委内瑞拉曾多次赢得国际选美大赛冠军
en: The eight stars on Venezuela's flag represent the eight provinces at independence
Angel Falls has a height of 979 meters, the world's highest waterfall
Venezuela has won numerous international beauty pageant titles

description.zh: 新西兰,是位于太平洋西南部的岛国。新西兰以其壮丽的自然风光、毛利文化和《指环王》拍摄地闻名于世。
description.en: New Zealand is an island country in the southwestern Pacific Ocean. New Zealand is famous for its stunning natural landscapes, Māori culture, and as the filming location for The Lord of the Rings.

zh: 新西兰国旗上的南十字星座代表其南半球位置
新西兰是世界上最后一个被人类发现的主要陆地
新西兰的几维鸟是国家象征
en: The Southern Cross on New Zealand's flag represents its Southern Hemisphere location
New Zealand was the last major landmass discovered by humans
The kiwi bird is New Zealand's national symbol

description.zh: 冰岛共和国,简称冰岛,是北大西洋中的岛国,位于格陵兰岛和挪威之间。冰岛是世界上火山活动最活跃的地区之一,拥有壮观的冰川、间歇泉和北极光。
description.en: Iceland is an island country in the North Atlantic, located between Greenland and Norway. Iceland is one of the most volcanically active regions in the world, featuring spectacular glaciers, geysers, and the Northern Lights.

zh: 冰岛是世界上最和平的国家,没有常备军队
冰岛议会成立于930年,是世界上最古老的议会之一
冰岛人均出版书籍数量全球第一
en: Iceland is the world's most peaceful country and has no standing army
Iceland's parliament, established in 930 AD, is one of the oldest in the world
Iceland publishes more books per capita than any other country

description.zh: 克罗地亚共和国,简称克罗地亚,位于欧洲东南部巴尔干半岛。克罗地亚拥有美丽的亚得里亚海海岸线、古老的城市和丰富的历史文化遗产。
description.en: Croatia is located in Southeast Europe on the Balkan Peninsula. Croatia boasts a beautiful Adriatic coastline, ancient cities, and a rich historical and cultural heritage.

zh: 克罗地亚国旗的红白格子图案源自中世纪盾徽
领带(Cravat)起源于克罗地亚
克罗地亚有10处联合国教科文组织世界遗产
en: The red-and-white checkerboard pattern on Croatia's flag originates from medieval coat of arms
The necktie (Cravat) originated in Croatia
Croatia has 10 UNESCO World Heritage Sites

description.zh: 塞尔维亚共和国,简称塞尔维亚,位于欧洲东南部巴尔干半岛中部。塞尔维亚拥有丰富的历史文化,是多瑙河和萨瓦河的交汇之地。
description.en: Serbia is located in the central Balkans in Southeast Europe. Serbia has a rich history and culture, and lies at the confluence of the Danube and Sava rivers.

zh: 塞尔维亚国旗采用泛斯拉夫颜色:红、蓝、白
尼古拉·特斯拉出生于现今塞尔维亚境内
贝尔格莱德是欧洲最古老的城市之一
en: Serbia's flag uses the Pan-Slavic colors: red, blue, and white
Nikola Tesla was born in present-day Serbia
Belgrade is one of the oldest cities in Europe

description.zh: 保加利亚共和国,简称保加利亚,位于欧洲东南部巴尔干半岛。保加利亚是西里尔字母的发源地,拥有悠久的历史和丰富的文化遗产。
description.en: Bulgaria is located in Southeast Europe on the Balkan Peninsula. Bulgaria is the birthplace of the Cyrillic alphabet and has a long history and rich cultural heritage.

zh: 保加利亚国旗的白、绿、红三色代表和平、农业和勇气
保加利亚是世界上玫瑰油的主要生产国
保加利亚人点头表示'不',摇头表示'是'
en: Bulgaria's white, green, and red flag represents peace, agriculture, and courage
Bulgaria is a major producer of rose oil in the world
Bulgarians nod to mean 'no' and shake their heads to mean 'yes'

description.zh: 斯洛伐克共和国,简称斯洛伐克,位于欧洲中部。斯洛伐克以其美丽的喀尔巴阡山脉、中世纪城堡和温泉小镇而闻名。
description.en: Slovakia is located in Central Europe. Slovakia is known for its beautiful Carpathian Mountains, medieval castles, and spa towns.

zh: 斯洛伐克国旗上的双十字来自拜占庭传统
斯洛伐克拥有超过180座城堡和遗址
斯洛伐克是世界上人均汽车产量最高的国家之一
en: The double cross on Slovakia's flag comes from Byzantine tradition
Slovakia has over 180 castles and castle ruins
Slovakia is one of the world's highest per capita car producers

description.zh: 斯洛文尼亚共和国,简称斯洛文尼亚,位于欧洲中南部。斯洛文尼亚拥有阿尔卑斯山脉、亚得里亚海海岸和广袤的森林,被誉为欧洲的绿色心脏。
description.en: Slovenia is located in south-central Europe. Slovenia features the Alps, an Adriatic coastline, and extensive forests, earning it the title of Europe's Green Heart.

zh: 斯洛文尼亚国旗上的特里格拉夫山是国家最高峰
斯洛文尼亚森林覆盖率超过60%
斯洛文尼亚是欧洲最早实现全民免费教育的国家之一
en: Mount Triglav on Slovenia's coat of arms is the country's highest peak
Over 60% of Slovenia is covered by forests
Slovenia was one of the first European countries to achieve universal free education

description.zh: 立陶宛共和国,简称立陶宛,位于欧洲东北部波罗的海东岸,是波罗的海三国之一。立陶宛拥有深厚的历史底蕴和美丽的自然风光。
description.en: Lithuania is located on the eastern shore of the Baltic Sea in northeastern Europe, one of the three Baltic states. Lithuania has a deep historical heritage and beautiful natural landscapes.

zh: 立陶宛国旗的黄、绿、红三色代表太阳、森林和勇气
立陶宛语是现存最古老的印欧语言之一
立陶宛在1990年成为第一个脱离苏联独立的国家
en: Lithuania's yellow, green, and red flag represents the sun, forests, and courage
Lithuanian is one of the oldest surviving Indo-European languages
Lithuania was the first country to declare independence from the Soviet Union in 1990

description.zh: 拉脱维亚共和国,简称拉脱维亚,位于欧洲东北部波罗的海东岸,是波罗的海三国之一。拉脱维亚拥有美丽的海滩、森林和新艺术建筑。
description.en: Latvia is located on the eastern shore of the Baltic Sea in northeastern Europe, one of the three Baltic states. Latvia features beautiful beaches, forests, and Art Nouveau architecture.

zh: 拉脱维亚国旗是世界上最古老的国旗之一,可追溯到13世纪
里加拥有欧洲最集中的新艺术建筑
拉脱维亚森林覆盖率超过50%
en: Latvia's flag is one of the oldest in the world, dating back to the 13th century
Riga has the highest concentration of Art Nouveau architecture in Europe
Over 50% of Latvia is covered by forests

description.zh: 爱沙尼亚共和国,简称爱沙尼亚,位于欧洲东北部波罗的海东岸,是波罗的海三国之一。爱沙尼亚是世界上数字化程度最高的国家之一。
description.en: Estonia is located on the eastern shore of the Baltic Sea in northeastern Europe, one of the three Baltic states. Estonia is one of the most digitally advanced countries in the world.

zh: 爱沙尼亚是Skype的诞生地
爱沙尼亚拥有世界上最先进的电子政务系统
爱沙尼亚人均初创企业数量全球领先
en: Estonia is the birthplace of Skype
Estonia has the world's most advanced e-government system
Estonia has one of the highest numbers of startups per capita globally

description.zh: 卢森堡大公国,简称卢森堡,位于欧洲西北部,是欧洲内陆小国之一。卢森堡是世界上最富裕的国家之一,也是欧盟和北约的创始成员国。
description.en: The Grand Duchy of Luxembourg is located in northwestern Europe, one of Europe's small landlocked countries. Luxembourg is one of the wealthiest countries in the world and a founding member of the EU and NATO.

zh: 卢森堡是世界上唯一的大公国
卢森堡人均GDP位居世界前列
卢森堡拥有三种官方语言
en: Luxembourg is the world's only Grand Duchy
Luxembourg has one of the highest GDP per capita in the world
Luxembourg has three official languages

description.zh: 泰王国,简称泰国,位于东南亚中南半岛中部。泰国是世界著名的旅游胜地,以其佛教寺庙、热带海滩和独特的文化而闻名。
description.en: The Kingdom of Thailand is located in the center of the Indochinese Peninsula in Southeast Asia. Thailand is a world-famous tourist destination, known for its Buddhist temples, tropical beaches, and unique culture.

zh: 泰国是东南亚唯一从未被殖民的国家
泰国有超过40,000座佛教寺庙
泰国的国王是世界上在位时间最长的君主之一
en: Thailand is the only Southeast Asian country never colonized
Thailand has over 40,000 Buddhist temples
Thailand's monarchy is one of the longest-reigning in the world

description.zh: 缅甸联邦共和国,简称缅甸,位于东南亚中南半岛西部。缅甸拥有丰富的自然资源、悠久的佛教传统和众多历史遗迹。
description.en: The Republic of the Union of Myanmar is located in western Indochina in Southeast Asia. Myanmar has abundant natural resources, a long Buddhist tradition, and numerous historical sites.

zh: 缅甸拥有世界上最大的铜锣,重达90吨
缅甸是世界上翡翠和红宝石的主要产地
仰光大金塔是世界上最古老的佛塔之一
en: Myanmar has the world's largest gong, weighing 90 tons
Myanmar is a major source of jade and rubies in the world
The Shwedagon Pagoda in Yangon is one of the oldest stupas in the world

description.zh: 柬埔寨王国,简称柬埔寨,位于东南亚中南半岛南部。柬埔寨以其世界文化遗产吴哥窟、丰富的历史文化和美丽的自然风光而闻名。
description.en: The Kingdom of Cambodia is located in southern Indochina in Southeast Asia. Cambodia is famous for the World Heritage Site Angkor Wat, its rich history and culture, and beautiful natural scenery.

zh: 吴哥窟是世界上最大的宗教建筑群
柬埔寨国旗是世界上唯一将建筑物作为主要图案的国旗
柬埔寨的洞里萨湖是东南亚最大的淡水湖
en: Angkor Wat is the world's largest religious monument complex
Cambodia's flag is the only national flag featuring a building as its central design
Cambodia's Tonle Sap Lake is the largest freshwater lake in Southeast Asia

description.zh: 老挝人民民主共和国,简称老挝,位于东南亚中南半岛北部,是东南亚唯一的内陆国。老挝以其宁静的佛教文化、原始森林和湄公河风光而闻名。
description.en: The Lao People's Democratic Republic is located in northern Indochina in Southeast Asia, the only landlocked country in Southeast Asia. Laos is known for its serene Buddhist culture, pristine forests, and Mekong River scenery.

zh: 老挝是世界上人均未爆炸弹药最多的国家
老挝拥有超过20,000座佛教寺庙
老挝是东南亚咖啡生产的重要国家
en: Laos has the most unexploded ordnance per capita in the world
Laos has over 20,000 Buddhist temples
Laos is an important coffee producer in Southeast Asia

description.zh: 蒙古国,简称蒙古,位于东亚北部,是世界第二大内陆国。蒙古以其辽阔的草原、游牧文化和成吉思汗的历史遗产而闻名。
description.en: Mongolia is located in northern East Asia, the world's second-largest landlocked country. Mongolia is famous for its vast grasslands, nomadic culture, and the historical legacy of Genghis Khan.

zh: 蒙古是世界上人口密度最低的国家
蒙古拥有世界上最后的游牧民族之一
成吉思汗建立了历史上最大的陆地帝国
en: Mongolia has the lowest population density in the world
Mongolia is home to one of the world's last nomadic peoples
Genghis Khan established the largest contiguous land empire in history

description.zh: 尼泊尔联邦民主共和国,简称尼泊尔,位于喜马拉雅山脉南麓,是世界上唯一一个非矩形国旗的国家。尼泊尔以其雪山、佛教文化和登山运动而闻名。
description.en: The Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal is located at the southern foot of the Himalayas, the only country with a non-rectangular flag. Nepal is famous for its snow-capped mountains, Buddhist culture, and mountaineering.

zh: 尼泊尔国旗是世界上唯一的非矩形国旗
珠穆朗玛峰位于尼泊尔和中国边境
尼泊尔是佛教创始人释迦牟尼的诞生地
en: Nepal's flag is the world's only non-rectangular national flag
Mount Everest is located on the Nepal-China border
Nepal is the birthplace of Gautama Buddha, the founder of Buddhism

description.zh: 斯里兰卡民主社会主义共和国,简称斯里兰卡,是位于印度洋的岛国。斯里兰卡以其美丽的海滩、茶叶种植园和丰富的历史文化遗产而闻名。
description.en: The Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka is an island country in the Indian Ocean. Sri Lanka is famous for its beautiful beaches, tea plantations, and rich historical and cultural heritage.

zh: 斯里兰卡国旗上的狮子代表僧伽罗人,叶子代表少数民族
斯里兰卡是世界上最大的茶叶出口国之一
斯里兰卡拥有8处联合国教科文组织世界遗产
en: The lion on Sri Lanka's flag represents the Sinhalese people, and the leaves represent minorities
Sri Lanka is one of the world's largest tea exporters
Sri Lanka has 8 UNESCO World Heritage Sites

description.zh: 哈萨克斯坦共和国,简称哈萨克斯坦,是世界上最大的内陆国,横跨欧亚两洲。哈萨克斯坦拥有丰富的石油和矿产资源,以及广袤的草原和沙漠。
description.en: The Republic of Kazakhstan is the world's largest landlocked country, spanning Europe and Asia. Kazakhstan has abundant oil and mineral resources, as well as vast grasslands and deserts.

zh: 哈萨克斯坦是世界上最大的内陆国
哈萨克斯坦拥有拜科努尔航天发射场,是世界上第一个航天发射场
哈萨克斯坦的苹果被认为是世界上所有苹果的祖先
en: Kazakhstan is the world's largest landlocked country
Kazakhstan hosts the Baikonur Cosmodrome, the world's first spaceport
Kazakhstan's apples are believed to be the ancestors of all apples worldwide

description.zh: 阿拉伯埃及共和国,简称埃及,位于非洲东北角,是世界四大文明古国之一。埃及以其金字塔、狮身人面像和尼罗河文明而闻名于世。
description.en: The Arab Republic of Egypt is located in the northeastern corner of Africa, one of the world's four ancient civilizations. Egypt is famous for its pyramids, the Sphinx, and Nile River civilization.

zh: 埃及国旗的红白黑三色代表革命、纯洁和黑暗时期的结束
吉萨金字塔是世界七大奇迹中唯一幸存至今的
苏伊士运河连接地中海和红海,是世界上最重要的航运通道之一
en: Egypt's red, white, and black flag represents revolution, purity, and the end of dark times
The Great Pyramid of Giza is the only surviving wonder of the ancient world
The Suez Canal connects the Mediterranean and Red Seas, one of the world's most important shipping routes

capital.zh: 比勒陀利亚(行政)、开普敦(立法)、布隆方丹(司法)

language.zh: 英语、祖鲁语等11种官方语言
language.en: English, Zulu, and 9 other official languages

description.zh: 南非共和国,简称南非,位于非洲大陆最南端。南非是非洲最发达的国家之一,以其丰富的矿产资源、多元文化和野生动物而闻名。
description.en: The Republic of South Africa is located at the southern tip of the African continent. South Africa is one of Africa's most developed countries, known for its mineral resources, diverse cultures, and wildlife.

zh: 南非拥有三个首都,是世界上唯一的三首都国家
南非拥有11种官方语言,是世界上官方语言最多的国家之一
南非是世界上最大的黄金和钻石生产国之一
en: South Africa has three capital cities, the only country in the world with three capitals
South Africa has 11 official languages, one of the most in the world
South Africa is one of the world's largest producers of gold and diamonds

description.zh: 摩洛哥王国,简称摩洛哥,位于非洲西北端。摩洛哥拥有丰富的历史文化遗产,以其蓝色城市、撒哈拉沙漠和古老的麦地那而闻名。
description.en: The Kingdom of Morocco is located at the northwestern tip of Africa. Morocco has a rich historical and cultural heritage, famous for its blue cities, the Sahara Desert, and ancient medinas.

zh: 摩洛哥国旗上的绿色五角星代表所罗门之印
摩洛哥是世界上最大的磷酸盐生产国
摩洛哥的非斯古城拥有世界上最古老的大学之一
en: The green pentagram on Morocco's flag represents the Seal of Solomon
Morocco is the world's largest producer of phosphates
The ancient city of Fez houses one of the world's oldest universities

description.zh: 突尼斯共和国,简称突尼斯,位于非洲北端。突尼斯拥有丰富的古罗马遗址和地中海海岸线,是阿拉伯之春的发源地。
description.en: The Republic of Tunisia is located at the northern tip of Africa. Tunisia has rich Roman ruins and a Mediterranean coastline, and is the birthplace of the Arab Spring.

zh: 突尼斯的迦太基遗址是联合国教科文组织世界遗产
突尼斯是阿拉伯之春运动的发源地
突尼斯拥有非洲最好的海滩之一
en: The ruins of Carthage in Tunisia are a UNESCO World Heritage Site
Tunisia is the birthplace of the Arab Spring movement
Tunisia has some of the best beaches in Africa

description.zh: 加纳共和国,简称加纳,位于西非几内亚湾北岸。加纳是非洲第一个获得独立的撒哈拉以南国家,以其可可生产和稳定的民主制度而闻名。
description.en: The Republic of Ghana is located on the northern coast of the Gulf of Guinea in West Africa. Ghana was the first sub-Saharan African country to gain independence, known for its cocoa production and stable democracy.

zh: 加纳国旗的黑星象征非洲自由
加纳是世界上第二大可可生产国
加纳是撒哈拉以南非洲第一个获得独立的国家
en: The black star on Ghana's flag symbolizes African freedom
Ghana is the world's second-largest cocoa producer
Ghana was the first sub-Saharan African country to gain independence

description.zh: 科特迪瓦共和国,又称象牙海岸,位于西非。科特迪瓦是世界最大的可可生产国,经济在西非国家中较为发达。
description.en: The Republic of Côte d'Ivoire, also known as Ivory Coast, is located in West Africa. Côte d'Ivoire is the world's largest cocoa producer and has a relatively developed economy among West African countries.

zh: 科特迪瓦国旗的橙、白、绿三色代表北部草原、和平统一和南部森林
科特迪瓦是世界上最大的可可生产国
亚穆苏克罗的和平圣母大教堂是世界上最大的教堂之一
en: Côte d'Ivoire's orange, white, and green flag represents northern savannas, peace and unity, and southern forests
Côte d'Ivoire is the world's largest cocoa producer
The Basilica of Our Lady of Peace in Yamoussoukro is one of the world's largest churches

description.zh: 塞内加尔共和国,简称塞内加尔,位于西非最西端。塞内加尔以其稳定的民主制度、丰富的音乐文化和达喀尔拉力赛而闻名。
description.en: The Republic of Senegal is located at the westernmost point of West Africa. Senegal is known for its stable democracy, rich musical culture, and the Dakar Rally.

zh: 塞内加尔国旗上的绿星代表希望和伊斯兰信仰
达喀尔拉力赛虽然现在在南美举行,但最初终点在塞内加尔首都达喀尔
塞内加尔从未发生过军事政变,是西非最稳定的民主国家之一
en: The green star on Senegal's flag represents hope and Islamic faith
The Dakar Rally, though now held in South America, originally finished in Senegal's capital Dakar
Senegal has never experienced a military coup and is one of West Africa's most stable democracies

description.zh: 乌干达共和国,简称乌干达,位于东非内陆。乌干达被称为'非洲明珠',拥有丰富的野生动物资源和维多利亚湖的一部分。
description.en: The Republic of Uganda is a landlocked country in East Africa. Known as the 'Pearl of Africa', Uganda has rich wildlife resources and part of Lake Victoria.

zh: 乌干达国旗中央的灰冠鹤是国家象征
乌干达拥有世界上一半的山地大猩猩
维多利亚湖是非洲最大的湖泊,乌干达拥有其大部分湖岸线
en: The grey crowned crane in the center of Uganda's flag is the national symbol
Uganda is home to half of the world's mountain gorillas
Lake Victoria is Africa's largest lake, and Uganda has most of its shoreline

description.zh: 坦桑尼亚联合共和国,简称坦桑尼亚,位于东非。坦桑尼亚拥有乞力马扎罗山、塞伦盖蒂国家公园和桑给巴尔岛等著名景点。
description.en: The United Republic of Tanzania is located in East Africa. Tanzania is home to Mount Kilimanjaro, Serengeti National Park, and the island of Zanzibar.

zh: 坦桑尼亚国旗的绿色、蓝色、黄色和黑色代表自然资源、海洋、矿产和人民
乞力马扎罗山是非洲最高峰,海拔5895米
坦桑尼亚的塞伦盖蒂国家公园是世界上最著名的野生动物保护区之一
en: Tanzania's green, blue, yellow, and black flag represents natural resources, oceans, minerals, and people
Mount Kilimanjaro is Africa's highest peak at 5,895 meters
Tanzania's Serengeti National Park is one of the world's most famous wildlife reserves

description.zh: 卢旺达共和国,简称卢旺达,位于东非内陆。卢旺达被称为'千丘之国',近年来经济发展迅速,以其清洁和安全的环境而闻名。
description.en: The Republic of Rwanda is a landlocked country in East Africa. Known as the 'Land of a Thousand Hills', Rwanda has experienced rapid economic development and is famous for its clean and safe environment.

zh: 卢旺达是世界上女性议员比例最高的国家
卢旺达在2008年成为第一个禁止塑料袋的非洲国家
卢旺达拥有世界上最后的山地大猩猩栖息地之一
en: Rwanda has the highest proportion of female parliamentarians in the world
Rwanda became the first African country to ban plastic bags in 2008
Rwanda is home to one of the last habitats for mountain gorillas

description.zh: 喀麦隆共和国,简称喀麦隆,位于中非西部。喀麦隆被称为'小非洲',因为它拥有非洲大陆几乎所有的地理和文化特征。
description.en: The Republic of Cameroon is located in western Central Africa. Cameroon is called 'Africa in miniature' because it exhibits all the major geographical and cultural features of the continent.

zh: 喀麦隆国旗的绿、红、黄三色代表森林、独立和太阳
喀麦隆是非洲足球强国,曾5次获得非洲国家杯冠军
喀麦隆山是西非最高峰,海拔4095米
en: Cameroon's green, red, and yellow flag represents forests, independence, and the sun
Cameroon is an African football powerhouse, having won the Africa Cup of Nations 5 times
Mount Cameroon is the highest peak in West Africa at 4,095 meters

description.zh: 安哥拉共和国,简称安哥拉,位于非洲西南部。安哥拉拥有丰富的石油和钻石资源,是非洲第二大石油生产国。
description.en: The Republic of Angola is located in southwestern Africa. Angola has abundant oil and diamond resources and is Africa's second-largest oil producer.

zh: 安哥拉国旗上的弯刀和齿轮代表农民和工人
安哥拉是非洲第二大石油生产国
安哥拉首都罗安达曾被评为世界上生活成本最高的城市
en: The machete and gear on Angola's flag represent farmers and workers
Angola is Africa's second-largest oil producer
Angola's capital Luanda was once ranked the world's most expensive city to live in

description.zh: 莫桑比克共和国,简称莫桑比克,位于非洲东南部。莫桑比克拥有漫长的印度洋海岸线,以其美丽的海滩和丰富的海洋生物而闻名。
description.en: The Republic of Mozambique is located in southeastern Africa. Mozambique has a long Indian Ocean coastline, famous for its beautiful beaches and rich marine life.

zh: 莫桑比克国旗是世界上唯一带有现代步枪图案的国旗
莫桑比克拥有世界上最大的腰果产量之一
莫桑比克的戈龙戈萨国家公园正在进行非洲最成功的野生动物恢复项目之一
en: Mozambique's flag is the only national flag featuring a modern rifle
Mozambique has one of the world's largest cashew nut productions
Mozambique's Gorongosa National Park is undergoing one of Africa's most successful wildlife restoration projects

currency.en: US Dollar, South African Rand, etc.

description.zh: 津巴布韦共和国,简称津巴布韦,位于非洲南部。津巴布韦以其壮观的维多利亚瀑布、大津巴布韦遗址和丰富的野生动物而闻名。
description.en: The Republic of Zimbabwe is located in southern Africa. Zimbabwe is famous for the spectacular Victoria Falls, Great Zimbabwe ruins, and abundant wildlife.

zh: 津巴布韦国旗上的鸟是津巴布韦鸟,来自大津巴布韦遗址
维多利亚瀑布是世界上最大的瀑布幕之一
大津巴布韦遗址是撒哈拉以南非洲最大的古代石造建筑
en: The bird on Zimbabwe's flag is the Zimbabwe bird from the Great Zimbabwe ruins
Victoria Falls is one of the largest waterfalls in the world
Great Zimbabwe is the largest ancient stone structure in sub-Saharan Africa

description.zh: 阿根廷共和国,简称阿根廷,位于南美洲南部。阿根廷以其探戈舞、足球文化、潘帕斯草原和安第斯山脉而闻名于世。
description.en: The Argentine Republic is located in southern South America. Argentina is famous for tango dance, football culture, the Pampas grasslands, and the Andes Mountains.

zh: 阿根廷国旗上的太阳是五月太阳,纪念独立运动
阿根廷是世界上第八大国家
阿根廷拥有世界上最宽的街道之一——七九大道
en: The sun on Argentina's flag is the Sun of May, commemorating independence
Argentina is the world's eighth-largest country
Argentina has one of the world's widest avenues, Avenida 9 de Julio

description.zh: 乌拉圭东岸共和国,简称乌拉圭,位于南美洲东南部。乌拉圭是南美洲最稳定和最富裕的国家之一,以其民主制度和社会福利而闻名。
description.en: The Oriental Republic of Uruguay is located in southeastern South America. Uruguay is one of the most stable and prosperous countries in South America, known for its democracy and social welfare.

zh: 乌拉圭国旗上的九条蓝白条纹代表独立时的九个省
乌拉圭是世界上第一个为所有公民提供免费笔记本电脑的国家
乌拉圭曾两次赢得足球世界杯冠军
en: The nine blue and white stripes on Uruguay's flag represent the nine provinces at independence
Uruguay was the first country to provide free laptops to all citizens
Uruguay has won the FIFA World Cup twice

description.zh: 巴拉圭共和国,简称巴拉圭,位于南美洲中部,是南美洲的内陆国之一。巴拉圭以其双语文化和伊瓜苏瀑布而闻名。
description.en: The Republic of Paraguay is located in central South America, one of the landlocked countries in South America. Paraguay is known for its bilingual culture and Iguazu Falls.

zh: 巴拉圭国旗是世界上唯一两面图案不同的国旗
巴拉圭是南美洲唯一仍在广泛使用土著语言的国家
巴拉圭拥有世界上最大的水电站之一——伊泰普大坝
en: Paraguay's flag is the only national flag with different designs on each side
Paraguay is the only South American country where an indigenous language is still widely spoken
Paraguay has one of the world's largest hydroelectric dams, Itaipu Dam

description.zh: 厄瓜多尔共和国,简称厄瓜多尔,位于南美洲西北部。厄瓜多尔因赤道横贯其境内而得名,拥有加拉帕戈斯群岛和亚马逊雨林。
description.en: The Republic of Ecuador is located in northwestern South America. Ecuador is named after the equator that crosses it, and is home to the Galápagos Islands and Amazon rainforest.

zh: 厄瓜多尔的国名意为'赤道',因赤道横贯其境内
加拉帕戈斯群岛是达尔文进化论的灵感来源地
基多是世界上第二高的首都,海拔2850米
en: Ecuador's name means 'equator' as it crosses the country
The Galápagos Islands inspired Darwin's theory of evolution
Quito is the world's second-highest capital city at 2,850 meters

capital.zh: 苏克雷(法定)、拉巴斯(实际)

language.zh: 西班牙语、克丘亚语、艾马拉语

description.zh: 多民族玻利维亚国,简称玻利维亚,位于南美洲中部,是南美洲的内陆国之一。玻利维亚拥有世界上最大的盐沼乌尤尼盐湖和丰富的土著文化。
description.en: The Plurinational State of Bolivia is located in central South America, one of the landlocked countries in South America. Bolivia has the world's largest salt flat, Salar de Uyuni, and rich indigenous culture.

zh: 玻利维亚拥有世界上最大的盐沼——乌尤尼盐湖
拉巴斯是世界上海拔最高的行政首都,海拔3650米
玻利维亚拥有36种官方语言,是世界上官方语言最多的国家之一
en: Bolivia has the world's largest salt flat, Salar de Uyuni
La Paz is the world's highest administrative capital at 3,650 meters
Bolivia has 36 official languages, one of the most in the world

description.zh: 阿富汗伊斯兰共和国,位于亚洲中南部的内陆国家,地处欧亚大陆的心脏地带。阿富汗拥有悠久的历史和多元的文化,是古代丝绸之路的重要枢纽。
description.en: The Islamic Republic of Afghanistan is a landlocked country in South-Central Asia, located at the heart of Eurasia. Afghanistan has a long history and diverse culture, serving as a key hub on the ancient Silk Road.

zh: 阿富汗被称为'帝国的坟场',历史上多个强大帝国都未能完全征服这片土地
阿富汗拥有世界上最优质的青金石矿藏
该国有超过50个民族,主要包括普什图人和塔吉克人
en: Afghanistan is known as the 'Graveyard of Empires' due to its resistance to foreign conquest
Afghanistan has some of the world's finest lapis lazuli deposits
The country has over 50 ethnic groups, mainly Pashtuns and Tajiks

description.zh: 亚美尼亚共和国,位于西亚外高加索地区的内陆国家。亚美尼亚是世界上第一个将基督教定为国教的国家,拥有深厚的文化和历史传统。
description.en: The Republic of Armenia is a landlocked country in the South Caucasus region of Western Asia. Armenia was the first nation to adopt Christianity as its state religion and has a rich cultural and historical heritage.

zh: 亚美尼亚在公元301年成为世界上第一个基督教国家
亚美尼亚拥有世界上最古老的酿酒厂,历史可追溯到公元前6100年
国际象棋是亚美尼亚的必修课程
en: Armenia became the world's first Christian nation in 301 AD
Armenia has the world's oldest winery, dating back to 6100 BC
Chess is a mandatory subject in Armenian schools

description.zh: 阿塞拜疆共和国,位于外高加索地区东部,濒临里海。阿塞拜疆是古代丝绸之路的重要站点,以其丰富的石油资源和独特的文化而闻名。
description.en: The Republic of Azerbaijan is located in the eastern Caucasus region, bordering the Caspian Sea. Azerbaijan was an important stop on the ancient Silk Road, known for its rich oil resources and unique culture.

zh: 阿塞拜疆被称为'火之国',因为其地下天然气自然燃烧的现象
巴库的火焰塔是世界上最高的火焰形建筑
阿塞拜疆是世界上第一个建立议会民主制的穆斯林国家
en: Azerbaijan is called the 'Land of Fire' due to naturally burning natural gas
Baku's Flame Towers are the world's tallest flame-shaped structures
Azerbaijan was the first Muslim country to establish parliamentary democracy

description.zh: 巴林王国,是位于波斯湾西岸的岛国,由33个岛屿组成。巴林是海湾地区重要的金融中心,也是中东地区最早发现石油的国家之一。
description.en: The Kingdom of Bahrain is an island nation on the western shores of the Persian Gulf, consisting of 33 islands. Bahrain is an important financial center in the Gulf region and one of the first Middle Eastern countries to discover oil.

zh: 巴林是阿拉伯世界面积最小的国家
巴林是中东地区第一个发现石油的国家(1932年)
巴林拥有中东地区最自由的经济体之一
en: Bahrain is the smallest country in the Arab world
Bahrain was the first Gulf country to discover oil in 1932
Bahrain has one of the freest economies in the Middle East

description.zh: 文莱达鲁萨兰国,位于东南亚婆罗洲北岸的君主制国家。文莱是世界上最富裕的国家之一,以其丰富的石油和天然气资源而闻名。
description.en: Brunei Darussalam is a monarchy located on the northern coast of Borneo in Southeast Asia. Brunei is one of the world's wealthiest nations, known for its abundant oil and natural gas resources.

zh: 文莱苏丹是世界上最富有的王室成员之一
文莱拥有世界上最大的水上村落——甘榜亚逸
文莱是世界上少数几个不征收个人所得税的国家
en: The Sultan of Brunei is one of the world's wealthiest royals
Brunei has the world's largest water village, Kampong Ayer
Brunei is one of the few countries with no personal income tax

description.zh: 不丹王国,位于喜马拉雅山脉东段南坡的内陆国家,介于中国和印度之间。不丹以'国民幸福总值'(GNH)而闻名,强调物质和精神发展的平衡。
description.en: The Kingdom of Bhutan is a landlocked country in the Eastern Himalayas, situated between China and India. Bhutan is famous for its 'Gross National Happiness' (GNH) philosophy, emphasizing balanced material and spiritual development.

zh: 不丹是世界上唯一用'国民幸福总值'(GNH)代替GDP衡量发展的国家
不丹禁止销售烟草,是世界上第一个全面禁烟的国家
不丹70%以上的国土被森林覆盖,宪法规定必须保持60%的森林覆盖率
en: Bhutan is the only country that measures development through Gross National Happiness instead of GDP
Bhutan banned tobacco sales, making it the first smoke-free nation
Over 70% of Bhutan is forested, with the constitution mandating at least 60% forest cover

description.zh: 格鲁吉亚,位于高加索地区的国家,地处欧亚大陆交界处。格鲁吉亚是世界上最古老的葡萄酒产区之一,拥有8000多年的酿酒历史。
description.en: Georgia is a country in the Caucasus region, located at the crossroads of Europe and Asia. Georgia is one of the world's oldest wine-producing regions, with over 8,000 years of winemaking history.

zh: 格鲁吉亚是葡萄酒的发源地,拥有8000多年的酿酒历史
格鲁吉亚字母是世界上14种独特字母系统之一
第比利斯的名字来自格鲁吉亚语'tbili',意为'温暖',因城市附近有温泉
en: Georgia is the birthplace of wine, with over 8,000 years of winemaking tradition
The Georgian alphabet is one of only 14 unique alphabets in the world
Tbilisi's name comes from 'tbili', meaning 'warm', due to the city's hot springs

description.zh: 约旦哈希姆王国,位于西亚阿拉伯半岛的西北部。约旦拥有丰富的历史遗迹,包括世界新七大奇迹之一的佩特拉古城。
description.en: The Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan is located in northwestern Arabia in Western Asia. Jordan has rich historical sites, including Petra, one of the New Seven Wonders of the World.

zh: 佩特拉古城是世界新七大奇迹之一,有'玫瑰之城'的美称
死海是地球上海拔最低的水域,湖面低于海平面约430米
约旦是中东地区最稳定和安全的国家之一
en: Petra, known as the 'Rose City', is one of the New Seven Wonders of the World
The Dead Sea is the lowest point on Earth, about 430 meters below sea level
Jordan is one of the most stable and safe countries in the Middle East

description.zh: 吉尔吉斯共和国,位于中亚的内陆国家,境内多山,有'中亚瑞士'之称。吉尔吉斯斯坦拥有壮丽的自然风光和独特的游牧文化。
description.en: The Kyrgyz Republic is a landlocked country in Central Asia, known as the 'Switzerland of Central Asia' due to its mountainous terrain. Kyrgyzstan has stunning natural landscapes and unique nomadic culture.

zh: 吉尔吉斯斯坦90%的国土是山地,被称为'中亚瑞士'
伊塞克湖是世界第二大高山湖泊,水质清澈且终年不冻
吉尔吉斯传统毡房(Yurt)是联合国教科文组织认定的非物质文化遗产
en: 90% of Kyrgyzstan is mountainous, earning it the nickname 'Switzerland of Central Asia'
Lake Issyk-Kul is the world's second-largest alpine lake and never freezes
The Kyrgyz yurt is recognized as UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage

description.zh: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国,简称朝鲜,位于朝鲜半岛北部。朝鲜是世界上最封闭的国家之一,实行计划经济体制。
description.en: The Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK), commonly known as North Korea, is located in the northern part of the Korean Peninsula. It is one of the world's most isolated countries, operating under a planned economy.

zh: 朝鲜使用自己的历法,称为主体历,以金日成诞生年(1912年)为元年
朝鲜拥有世界上最大的体育场——绫罗岛五一体育场,可容纳15万人
平壤地铁是世界上最深的地铁系统之一,最深处达地下110米
en: North Korea uses its own calendar, the Juche calendar, starting from Kim Il-sung's birth year (1912)
The Rungrado 1st of May Stadium is the world's largest stadium, seating 150,000
Pyongyang Metro is one of the world's deepest metro systems, reaching 110 meters underground

wikiUrl.zh: https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh: 科威特国,位于波斯湾西北岸的阿拉伯国家。科威特拥有丰富的石油储备,是世界主要石油出口国之一,人均GDP位居世界前列。
description.en: The State of Kuwait is an Arab country on the northwestern shore of the Persian Gulf. Kuwait has abundant oil reserves and is one of the world's major oil exporters, with one of the highest GDPs per capita globally.

zh: 科威特第纳尔是世界上价值最高的货币单位
科威特拥有世界第六大石油储量
科威特塔是该国的标志性建筑,也是中东地区的重要地标
en: The Kuwaiti Dinar is the highest-valued currency unit in the world
Kuwait has the world's sixth-largest oil reserves
The Kuwait Towers are an iconic landmark and symbol of modern Kuwait

description.zh: 黎巴嫩共和国,位于西亚地中海东岸。黎巴嫩拥有悠久的历史文化,首都贝鲁特曾被誉为'中东的巴黎',是重要的金融和文化中心。
description.en: The Lebanese Republic is located on the eastern shore of the Mediterranean Sea in Western Asia. Lebanon has a rich history and culture, with its capital Beirut once known as the 'Paris of the Middle East', an important financial and cultural center.

zh: 黎巴嫩雪松是国家象征,出现在国旗上,有超过3000年历史
黎巴嫩是世界上唯一没有沙漠的阿拉伯国家
贝鲁特是世界上最古老的城市之一,已有5000多年历史
en: The Cedar of Lebanon is a national symbol on the flag, with trees over 3,000 years old
Lebanon is the only Arab country without a desert
Beirut is one of the world's oldest cities, with over 5,000 years of history

description.zh: 马尔代夫共和国,位于印度洋上的岛国,由26个环礁、1192个珊瑚岛组成。马尔代夫以其碧蓝的海水、洁白的沙滩和丰富的海洋生物而闻名,是世界著名的旅游胜地。
description.en: The Maldives is an island nation in the Indian Ocean, consisting of 26 atolls and 1,192 coral islands. The Maldives is famous for its crystal-clear waters, white sandy beaches, and rich marine life, making it a world-renowned tourist destination.

zh: 马尔代夫是世界上最平坦的国家,平均海拔仅1.5米
马尔代夫是亚洲面积最小的国家
由于全球变暖和海平面上升,马尔代夫面临着被淹没的威胁
en: The Maldives is the world's flattest country, with an average elevation of only 1.5 meters
The Maldives is the smallest country in Asia by area
Due to global warming and rising sea levels, the Maldives faces the threat of submersion

description.zh: 阿曼苏丹国,位于阿拉伯半岛东南沿海。阿曼是阿拉伯世界最古老的独立国家之一,拥有丰富的历史文化和壮丽的自然景观。
description.en: The Sultanate of Oman is located on the southeastern coast of the Arabian Peninsula. Oman is one of the oldest independent states in the Arab world, with rich history, culture, and stunning natural landscapes.

zh: 阿曼拥有世界上最大的单体乳香树林,乳香是古代重要的贸易商品
阿曼苏丹卡布斯大清真寺拥有世界第二大手工编织地毯
阿曼是阿拉伯半岛最稳定、最安全的国家之一
en: Oman has the world's largest frankincense forests; frankincense was a precious ancient trade commodity
The Sultan Qaboos Grand Mosque has the world's second-largest hand-woven carpet
Oman is one of the most stable and safe countries in the Arabian Peninsula

description.zh: 卡塔尔国,位于波斯湾西南岸的卡塔尔半岛上。卡塔尔拥有世界第三大天然气储量,是全球最富裕的国家之一,曾成功举办2022年FIFA世界杯。
description.en: The State of Qatar is located on the Qatar Peninsula on the southwestern coast of the Persian Gulf. Qatar has the world's third-largest natural gas reserves and is one of the wealthiest countries globally, successfully hosting the 2022 FIFA World Cup.

zh: 卡塔尔是2022年FIFA世界杯的举办国,也是首个举办世界杯的中东国家
卡塔尔拥有世界上最高的人均GDP之一
半岛电视台总部设在卡塔尔首都多哈
en: Qatar hosted the 2022 FIFA World Cup, the first Middle Eastern country to do so
Qatar has one of the highest GDPs per capita in the world
Al Jazeera Media Network is headquartered in Doha, Qatar

description.zh: 阿拉伯叙利亚共和国,位于西亚地中海东岸。叙利亚拥有悠久的历史,是人类文明的重要发源地之一,大马士革被认为是世界上最古老的持续有人居住的城市。
description.en: The Syrian Arab Republic is located on the eastern shore of the Mediterranean in Western Asia. Syria has a long history and is one of the cradles of human civilization. Damascus is considered the world's oldest continuously inhabited city.

zh: 大马士革是世界上最古老的持续有人居住的城市,已有超过11000年历史
叙利亚是世界上最早的农业文明发源地之一
阿勒颇古城是世界文化遗产,拥有数千年的历史
en: Damascus is the world's oldest continuously inhabited city, with over 11,000 years of history
Syria is one of the earliest centers of agricultural civilization
The Ancient City of Aleppo is a UNESCO World Heritage Site with thousands of years of history

description.zh: 塔吉克斯坦共和国,位于中亚东南部的内陆国家,是中亚五国中唯一主体民族非突厥族系的国家。塔吉克斯坦多山,有'高山之国'的美誉。
description.en: The Republic of Tajikistan is a landlocked country in southeastern Central Asia, the only Central Asian nation whose main ethnic group is not Turkic. Tajikistan is mountainous, known as the 'Land of Mountains'.

zh: 塔吉克斯坦93%的国土是山地,拥有众多海拔超过7000米的高峰
帕米尔高原被称为'世界屋脊',大部分位于塔吉克斯坦境内
塔吉克斯坦拥有世界上最长的旗杆,高165米
en: 93% of Tajikistan is mountainous, with numerous peaks over 7,000 meters
The Pamir Mountains, known as the 'Roof of the World', are mostly in Tajikistan
Tajikistan has the world's tallest flagpole at 165 meters

description.zh: 东帝汶民主共和国,位于东南亚努沙登加拉群岛东端。东帝汶于2002年独立,是21世纪第一个新独立的国家,也是亚洲最年轻的国家之一。
description.en: The Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste is located at the eastern end of the Lesser Sunda Islands in Southeast Asia. Timor-Leste gained independence in 2002, making it the first new sovereign state of the 21st century and one of Asia's youngest nations.

zh: 东帝汶是21世纪第一个独立的国家(2002年)
东帝汶是亚洲唯一以葡萄牙语为官方语言的国家
东帝汶拥有丰富的石油和天然气资源
en: Timor-Leste was the first country to gain independence in the 21st century (2002)
Timor-Leste is the only Asian country with Portuguese as an official language
Timor-Leste has significant oil and natural gas resources

description.zh: 土库曼斯坦,位于中亚西南部的内陆国家。土库曼斯坦拥有世界第四大天然气储量,首都阿什哈巴德以其大量白色大理石建筑而闻名,被称为'白色之城'。
description.en: Turkmenistan is a landlocked country in southwestern Central Asia. It has the world's fourth-largest natural gas reserves. The capital Ashgabat is known as the 'White City' for its numerous white marble buildings.

zh: 土库曼斯坦拥有世界第四大天然气储量
阿什哈巴德被吉尼斯世界纪录认定为世界上白色大理石建筑最密集的城市
达瓦扎天然气坑被称为'地狱之门',自1971年起持续燃烧至今
en: Turkmenistan has the world's fourth-largest natural gas reserves
Ashgabat holds the Guinness record for the highest density of white marble buildings
The Darvaza gas crater, known as the 'Door to Hell', has been burning continuously since 1971

description.zh: 乌兹别克斯坦共和国,位于中亚的内陆国家,是古代丝绸之路的重要枢纽。乌兹别克斯坦拥有撒马尔罕、布哈拉等历史名城,文化遗产极为丰富。
description.en: The Republic of Uzbekistan is a landlocked country in Central Asia, an important hub on the ancient Silk Road. Uzbekistan has historic cities like Samarkand and Bukhara, with exceptionally rich cultural heritage.

zh: 撒马尔罕是世界上最古老的城市之一,拥有2750多年历史
乌兹别克斯坦是世界上仅有的两个双重内陆国之一(需跨越两个国家才能到达海洋)
布哈拉古城是联合国教科文组织世界文化遗产,保存了千年的伊斯兰建筑
en: Samarkand is one of the world's oldest cities, with over 2,750 years of history
Uzbekistan is one of only two doubly landlocked countries in the world
The Historic Centre of Bukhara is a UNESCO World Heritage Site preserving thousand-year-old Islamic architecture

description.zh: 也门共和国,位于阿拉伯半岛南端。也门是阿拉伯世界古代文明的摇篮之一,拥有悠久的历史和独特的建筑风格,萨那古城以其独特的塔楼式建筑而闻名。
description.en: The Republic of Yemen is located at the southern end of the Arabian Peninsula. Yemen is one of the cradles of ancient Arab civilization, with a long history and unique architectural style. The Old City of Sana'a is famous for its distinctive tower houses.

zh: 也门是传说中示巴女王王国的所在地
萨那古城拥有世界上最独特的建筑风格之一——塔楼式多层土坯建筑
也门是咖啡摩卡的原产地,摩卡咖啡因也门港口城市摩卡而得名
en: Yemen is believed to be the location of the legendary Kingdom of Sheba
The Old City of Sana'a features one of the world's most unique architectural styles with multi-story tower houses
Yemen is the origin of Mocha coffee, named after the Yemeni port city of Mocha

description.zh: 安道尔公国,位于法国和西班牙之间的比利牛斯山脉东部的内陆小国。安道尔是世界上少数几个公国之一,以其滑雪胜地和免税购物而闻名。
description.en: The Principality of Andorra is a small landlocked country in the eastern Pyrenees mountains between France and Spain. Andorra is one of the few remaining principalities in the world, famous for its ski resorts and tax-free shopping.

zh: 安道尔是欧洲面积第六小的国家,也是世界上唯一以加泰罗尼亚语为官方语言的国家
安道尔拥有世界上最高的预期寿命之一
安道尔没有机场和铁路,最近的机场在西班牙和法国境内
en: Andorra is Europe's sixth-smallest country and the only country with Catalan as its official language
Andorra has one of the highest life expectancies in the world
Andorra has no airport or railway; the nearest airports are in Spain and France

description.zh: 阿尔巴尼亚共和国,位于巴尔干半岛西南部,濒临亚得里亚海和爱奥尼亚海。阿尔巴尼亚拥有悠久的历史和美丽的海岸线,被誉为'山鹰之国'。
description.en: The Republic of Albania is located in the southwestern Balkans, along the Adriatic and Ionian Seas. Albania has a long history and beautiful coastline, known as the 'Land of Eagles'.

zh: 阿尔巴尼亚被称为'山鹰之国',国旗上就有双头鹰的图案
阿尔巴尼亚曾是欧洲唯一的官方无神论国家(1967-1991)
阿尔巴尼亚拥有超过750,000个碉堡,人均碉堡数量世界第一
en: Albania is called the 'Land of Eagles', with a double-headed eagle on its flag
Albania was once Europe's only officially atheist state (1967-1991)
Albania has over 750,000 bunkers, the highest number per capita in the world

language.zh: 波斯尼亚语、塞尔维亚语、克罗地亚语

description.zh: 波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那,位于巴尔干半岛中西部。这个多民族国家拥有丰富的文化遗产,首都萨拉热窝曾是1984年冬季奥运会的举办地。
description.en: Bosnia and Herzegovina is located in the central-western Balkans. This multi-ethnic country has rich cultural heritage, and its capital Sarajevo hosted the 1984 Winter Olympics.

zh: 萨拉热窝曾举办1984年冬季奥运会
莫斯塔尔古桥是联合国教科文组织世界遗产,建于16世纪
波黑是欧洲形状最像心形的国家
en: Sarajevo hosted the 1984 Winter Olympics
The Old Bridge in Mostar is a UNESCO World Heritage Site, built in the 16th century
Bosnia and Herzegovina has the most heart-shaped outline in Europe

wikiUrl.zh: https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那

description.zh: 白俄罗斯共和国,位于东欧平原,是东欧的内陆国家。白俄罗斯拥有大片原始森林,其中包括欧洲最后的原始森林之一——比亚沃维耶扎原始森林。
description.en: The Republic of Belarus is located on the East European Plain, a landlocked country in Eastern Europe. Belarus has vast primeval forests, including one of Europe's last primeval forests, Białowieża Forest.

zh: 比亚沃维耶扎原始森林是欧洲最后的原始森林之一,也是欧洲野牛的家园
白俄罗斯40%的国土被森林覆盖
明斯克在二战中几乎被完全摧毁,战后重建成为现代化城市
en: Białowieża Forest is one of Europe's last primeval forests and home to European bison
40% of Belarus is covered by forests
Minsk was almost completely destroyed in WWII and rebuilt as a modern city

description.zh: 塞浦路斯共和国,位于地中海东部的岛国,地处欧洲、亚洲和非洲的交汇点。塞浦路斯拥有悠久的历史和美丽的海滩,是著名的旅游胜地。
description.en: The Republic of Cyprus is an island country in the eastern Mediterranean, at the crossroads of Europe, Asia, and Africa. Cyprus has a long history and beautiful beaches, making it a popular tourist destination.

zh: 塞浦路斯是传说中爱与美的女神阿芙罗狄蒂(维纳斯)的诞生地
尼科西亚是世界上最后一个分裂的首都
塞浦路斯拥有超过300天的日照,是欧洲阳光最充足的国家之一
en: Cyprus is the legendary birthplace of Aphrodite (Venus), the goddess of love and beauty
Nicosia is the world's last divided capital
Cyprus enjoys over 300 days of sunshine annually, one of Europe's sunniest countries

description.zh: 列支敦士登公国,位于瑞士和奥地利之间的阿尔卑斯山区的内陆小国。列支敦士登是世界上最富裕的国家之一,以其金融服务业和精美的邮票而闻名。
description.en: The Principality of Liechtenstein is a small landlocked country in the Alps between Switzerland and Austria. Liechtenstein is one of the world's wealthiest countries, known for its financial services and exquisite postage stamps.

zh: 列支敦士登是世界上唯一一个完全位于阿尔卑斯山区的国家
列支敦士登是世界上人均GDP最高的国家之一
列支敦士登没有军队,国防由瑞士负责
en: Liechtenstein is the only country entirely located in the Alps
Liechtenstein has one of the highest GDPs per capita in the world
Liechtenstein has no army; its defense is handled by Switzerland

description.zh: 摩纳哥公国,位于法国南部地中海沿岸的城邦国家,是世界上第二小的国家。摩纳哥以其豪华赌场、游艇港和一级方程式赛车而闻名,也是世界上人口密度最高的国家。
description.en: The Principality of Monaco is a city-state on the French Riviera in Western Europe, the world's second-smallest country. Monaco is famous for its luxury casinos, yacht-lined harbor, and Formula 1 Grand Prix, and has the world's highest population density.

zh: 摩纳哥是世界上人口密度最高的国家
摩纳哥蒙特卡洛赌场是世界上最著名的赌场之一
摩纳哥F1大奖赛是一级方程式赛车最负盛名的赛事之一
en: Monaco has the world's highest population density
The Monte Carlo Casino is one of the world's most famous casinos
The Monaco Grand Prix is one of the most prestigious Formula 1 races

description.zh: 摩尔多瓦共和国,位于东欧的内陆国家,夹在罗马尼亚和乌克兰之间。摩尔多瓦以其葡萄酒产业而闻名,拥有世界上最大的葡萄酒窖之一——米列什蒂·米茨葡萄酒窖。
description.en: The Republic of Moldova is a landlocked country in Eastern Europe, between Romania and Ukraine. Moldova is famous for its wine industry and has one of the world's largest wine cellars, Mileștii Mici.

zh: 摩尔多瓦拥有世界上最大的葡萄酒窖,总长达200公里
摩尔多瓦是世界上人均葡萄酒消费量最高的国家之一
摩尔多瓦的葡萄种植历史可以追溯到5000年前
en: Moldova has the world's largest wine cellar, stretching 200 kilometers
Moldova has one of the highest wine consumption rates per capita in the world
Moldova's wine-making history dates back 5,000 years

description.zh: 黑山,位于巴尔干半岛西南部,濒临亚得里亚海。黑山于2006年独立,是欧洲最年轻的国家之一,以其壮丽的山脉和美丽的海岸线而闻名。
description.en: Montenegro is located in the southwestern Balkans, along the Adriatic Sea. It gained independence in 2006, making it one of Europe's youngest countries, known for its stunning mountains and beautiful coastline.

zh: 黑山在2006年通过公投和平独立,是欧洲最年轻的国家之一
科托尔湾被誉为'欧洲最南端的峡湾'
黑山的名字在多种语言中都是'黑山'的意思
en: Montenegro peacefully gained independence through a referendum in 2006
The Bay of Kotor is called 'Europe's southernmost fjord'
Montenegro's name means 'Black Mountain' in various languages

description.zh: 北马其顿共和国,位于巴尔干半岛中南部的内陆国家。北马其顿拥有悠久的历史,是古代马其顿王国的核心地区之一,也是亚历山大大帝的故乡。
description.en: The Republic of North Macedonia is a landlocked country in the central-southern Balkans. It has a long history and was part of the core region of the ancient Kingdom of Macedon, homeland of Alexander the Great.

zh: 北马其顿的奥赫里德湖是欧洲最古老和最深的湖泊之一
特蕾莎修女出生在斯科普里(当时属于奥斯曼帝国)
北马其顿2019年改名,在国名中加入'北'字以解决与希腊的争议
en: Lake Ohrid is one of Europe's oldest and deepest lakes
Mother Teresa was born in Skopje (then part of the Ottoman Empire)
The country added 'North' to its name in 2019 to resolve a dispute with Greece

description.zh: 马耳他共和国,位于地中海中部的岛国,地处欧洲和非洲之间。马耳他拥有7000多年的历史,是联合国教科文组织世界遗产的宝库,首都瓦莱塔被誉为欧洲最小的首都。
description.en: The Republic of Malta is an island nation in the central Mediterranean, between Europe and Africa. Malta has over 7,000 years of history and is a treasure trove of UNESCO World Heritage Sites, with its capital Valletta being Europe's smallest capital.

zh: 马耳他语是唯一使用拉丁字母书写的闪含语系语言
马耳他拥有世界上最古老的独立结构建筑——巨石庙
瓦莱塔是欧洲最小的首都,但整个城市都是联合国世界遗产
en: Maltese is the only Semitic language written in Latin script
Malta has the world's oldest free-standing structures, the Megalithic Temples
Valletta is Europe's smallest capital, but the entire city is a UNESCO World Heritage Site

description.zh: 圣马力诺共和国,位于意大利半岛东部,完全被意大利环绕的内陆国家。圣马力诺成立于公元301年,是世界上最古老的共和国,也是欧洲第三小的国家。
description.en: The Republic of San Marino is located in the Italian Peninsula, completely surrounded by Italy. Founded in 301 AD, San Marino is the world's oldest republic and Europe's third-smallest country.

zh: 圣马力诺是世界上最古老的共和国,成立于公元301年
圣马力诺是世界上唯一一个车辆数量多于人口的国家
圣马力诺从未被征服过,保持了1700多年的独立
en: San Marino is the world's oldest republic, founded in 301 AD
San Marino is the only country with more vehicles than people
San Marino has never been conquered, maintaining independence for over 1,700 years

description.zh: 布基纳法索,位于西非的内陆国家,国名意为'正直的人的国家'。布基纳法索拥有丰富的文化传统,以其传统音乐和手工艺品而闻名。
description.en: Burkina Faso is a landlocked country in West Africa, whose name means 'Land of Honest People'. It has rich cultural traditions and is known for its traditional music and handicrafts.

zh: 布基纳法索的国名意为'正直的人的国家'
瓦加杜古每两年举办一次非洲最大的电影节——泛非电影节
布基纳法索是世界上棉花产量最高的国家之一
en: Burkina Faso means 'Land of Honest People'
Ouagadougou hosts FESPACO, Africa's largest film festival, every two years
Burkina Faso is one of the world's leading cotton producers

description.zh: 布隆迪共和国,位于东非大裂谷地区的内陆国家。布隆迪是非洲人口密度最高的国家之一,拥有美丽的坦噶尼喀湖景观。
description.en: The Republic of Burundi is a landlocked country in the Great Rift Valley of East Africa. It is one of Africa's most densely populated countries, with beautiful Lake Tanganyika scenery.

zh: 布隆迪是非洲人口密度最高的国家之一
布隆迪的鼓乐传统被联合国教科文组织列为非物质文化遗产
坦噶尼喀湖是世界第二深的湖泊
en: Burundi has one of the highest population densities in Africa
Burundian drumming is recognized as UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage
Lake Tanganyika is the world's second-deepest lake

description.zh: 贝宁共和国,位于西非,濒临几内亚湾。贝宁是伏都教的发源地之一,拥有丰富的历史文化遗产,曾是古达荷美王国的所在地。
description.en: The Republic of Benin is located in West Africa, along the Gulf of Guinea. Benin is one of the birthplaces of Voodoo and has rich historical and cultural heritage, once home to the Kingdom of Dahomey.

zh: 贝宁是伏都教(Voodoo)的发源地之一
阿波美王宫是联合国世界文化遗产,展示了达荷美王国的历史
贝宁曾是非洲奴隶贸易的重要中心
en: Benin is one of the birthplaces of Voodoo religion
The Royal Palaces of Abomey are a UNESCO World Heritage Site showcasing the Kingdom of Dahomey
Benin was a major center of the African slave trade

description.zh: 博茨瓦纳共和国,位于非洲南部的内陆国家。博茨瓦纳拥有世界上最大的内陆三角洲——奥卡万戈三角洲,是非洲野生动物的天堂,也是世界上最大的钻石生产国之一。
description.en: The Republic of Botswana is a landlocked country in Southern Africa. It has the world's largest inland delta, the Okavango Delta, a paradise for African wildlife, and is one of the world's largest diamond producers.

zh: 博茨瓦纳拥有世界上最大的内陆三角洲——奥卡万戈三角洲
博茨瓦纳是世界上最大的钻石生产国之一
博茨瓦纳约38%的国土是保护区和国家公园
en: Botswana has the world's largest inland delta, the Okavango Delta
Botswana is one of the world's largest diamond producers
About 38% of Botswana is protected as reserves and national parks

description.zh: 刚果民主共和国,位于非洲中部,是非洲面积第二大的国家。刚果拥有世界第二大热带雨林和丰富的矿产资源,刚果河是世界上最深的河流。
description.en: The Democratic Republic of the Congo is located in Central Africa and is Africa's second-largest country by area. It has the world's second-largest rainforest and abundant mineral resources, and the Congo River is the world's deepest river.

zh: 刚果河是世界上最深的河流,深度超过220米
刚果盆地拥有世界第二大热带雨林,仅次于亚马逊雨林
刚果拥有世界上最丰富的钴矿储量,占全球储量的50%以上
en: The Congo River is the world's deepest river, exceeding 220 meters in depth
The Congo Basin has the world's second-largest rainforest after the Amazon
Congo has over 50% of the world's cobalt reserves

description.zh: 中非共和国,位于非洲中部的内陆国家,地处非洲大陆的地理中心。中非拥有丰富的野生动物资源和矿产资源,但也是世界上最不发达的国家之一。
description.en: The Central African Republic is a landlocked country in Central Africa, located at the geographic center of the African continent. It has abundant wildlife and mineral resources but is also one of the world's least developed countries.

zh: 中非共和国位于非洲大陆的地理中心
曼沃-贡达-圣弗洛里斯国家公园是联合国世界自然遗产
中非拥有丰富的钻石和黄金资源
en: The Central African Republic is at the geographic center of Africa
Manovo-Gounda St. Floris National Park is a UNESCO World Heritage Site
CAR has abundant diamond and gold resources

description.zh: 刚果共和国,又称刚果(布),位于非洲中西部。刚果(布)拥有丰富的石油资源和热带雨林,首都布拉柴维尔与刚果民主共和国首都金沙萨隔刚果河相望,是世界上距离最近的两个首都。
description.en: The Republic of the Congo, also known as Congo-Brazzaville, is located in west-central Africa. It has abundant oil resources and rainforests. Its capital Brazzaville faces Kinshasa across the Congo River, making them the world's closest pair of capital cities.

zh: 布拉柴维尔和金沙萨是世界上距离最近的两个首都,仅隔刚果河相望
刚果(布)约70%的国土被热带雨林覆盖
刚果(布)是中非地区重要的石油生产国
en: Brazzaville and Kinshasa are the world's closest capital cities, separated only by the Congo River
About 70% of Congo-Brazzaville is covered by rainforest
Congo-Brazzaville is a significant oil producer in Central Africa

description.zh: 佛得角共和国,位于大西洋中部的岛国,由10个火山岛组成。佛得角是非洲最稳定的民主国家之一,以其独特的克里奥尔文化和音乐而闻名。
description.en: The Republic of Cabo Verde is an island nation in the central Atlantic Ocean, consisting of 10 volcanic islands. Cape Verde is one of Africa's most stable democracies, famous for its unique Creole culture and music.

zh: 佛得角的名字意为'绿色海角',但实际上岛屿非常干旱
佛得角是著名歌手塞萨利亚·埃沃拉的故乡
佛得角是非洲人类发展指数最高的国家之一
en: Cape Verde means 'Green Cape', but the islands are actually very arid
Cape Verde is the homeland of famous singer Cesária Évora
Cape Verde has one of the highest Human Development Indexes in Africa

description.zh: 吉布提共和国,位于非洲之角,扼守红海与亚丁湾之间的曼德海峡。吉布提因其战略地理位置而成为重要的国际航运枢纽,拥有多个国家的军事基地。
description.en: The Republic of Djibouti is located in the Horn of Africa, commanding the strait of Bab el-Mandeb between the Red Sea and Gulf of Aden. Due to its strategic location, Djibouti is an important international shipping hub with military bases from several countries.

zh: 吉布提扼守世界上最重要的海上航道之一——曼德海峡
吉布提拥有多个国家的军事基地,包括美国、法国和中国
阿萨尔湖是非洲最低点,低于海平面155米
en: Djibouti controls the Bab el-Mandeb strait, one of the world's most important maritime passages
Djibouti hosts military bases from multiple countries including the US, France, and China
Lake Assal is Africa's lowest point, 155 meters below sea level

language.zh: 提格雷尼亚语、阿拉伯语、英语

description.zh: 厄立特里亚国,位于非洲之角,濒临红海。厄立特里亚于1993年从埃塞俄比亚独立,首都阿斯马拉以其意大利殖民时期建筑而被列为世界文化遗产。
description.en: The State of Eritrea is located in the Horn of Africa, along the Red Sea. Eritrea gained independence from Ethiopia in 1993. Its capital Asmara is a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its Italian colonial architecture.

zh: 阿斯马拉因其保存完好的意大利殖民时期建筑被列为联合国世界文化遗产
厄立特里亚拥有非洲最长的红海海岸线之一
厄立特里亚的国名来自红海的古希腊语名称
en: Asmara is a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its well-preserved Italian colonial architecture
Eritrea has one of Africa's longest Red Sea coastlines
Eritrea's name derives from the ancient Greek name for the Red Sea

description.zh: 加蓬共和国,位于非洲中西部,濒临大西洋。加蓬拥有丰富的石油和矿产资源,88%的国土被热带雨林覆盖,是非洲森林覆盖率最高的国家之一。
description.en: The Gabonese Republic is located in west-central Africa, along the Atlantic Ocean. Gabon has abundant oil and mineral resources, with 88% of its territory covered by rainforest, making it one of Africa's most forested countries.

zh: 加蓬88%的国土被热带雨林覆盖,是非洲森林覆盖率最高的国家
加蓬拥有13个国家公园,致力于生态保护
加蓬是非洲人均GDP最高的国家之一
en: 88% of Gabon is covered by rainforest, the highest percentage in Africa
Gabon has 13 national parks dedicated to ecological conservation
Gabon has one of the highest GDPs per capita in Africa

description.zh: 冈比亚共和国,位于西非,是非洲大陆最小的国家。冈比亚几乎被塞内加尔完全包围,国土沿冈比亚河两岸延伸,形状狭长独特。
description.en: The Republic of The Gambia is located in West Africa and is Africa's smallest mainland country. Almost entirely surrounded by Senegal, Gambia extends along both banks of the Gambia River in a unique narrow shape.

zh: 冈比亚是非洲大陆最小的国家
冈比亚几乎被塞内加尔完全包围,仅有很短的大西洋海岸线
冈比亚河贯穿全国,是国家的生命线
en: The Gambia is Africa's smallest mainland country
The Gambia is almost entirely surrounded by Senegal, with only a short Atlantic coastline
The Gambia River runs through the entire country and is its lifeline

description.zh: 几内亚共和国,位于西非,濒临大西洋。几内亚拥有世界上最丰富的铝土矿储量,被称为'地质奇迹',同时也是西非主要河流尼日尔河、塞内加尔河和冈比亚河的发源地。
description.en: The Republic of Guinea is located in West Africa, along the Atlantic Ocean. Guinea has the world's largest bauxite reserves and is called a 'geological miracle'. It is also the source of major West African rivers: the Niger, Senegal, and Gambia.

zh: 几内亚拥有世界上最大的铝土矿储量,占全球储量的三分之一
几内亚是西非主要河流的发源地,被称为'西非水塔'
几内亚拥有丰富的传统音乐文化,是非洲打击乐的重要中心
en: Guinea has the world's largest bauxite reserves, about one-third of global reserves
Guinea is the source of major West African rivers, called the 'Water Tower of West Africa'
Guinea has a rich tradition of music and is an important center for African percussion

description.zh: 赤道几内亚共和国,位于非洲中西部,是非洲唯一以西班牙语为官方语言的国家。赤道几内亚由大陆部分和几个岛屿组成,拥有丰富的石油和天然气资源。
description.en: The Republic of Equatorial Guinea is located in west-central Africa and is the only African country with Spanish as an official language. It consists of a mainland region and several islands, with abundant oil and gas resources.

zh: 赤道几内亚是撒哈拉以南非洲唯一以西班牙语为官方语言的国家
首都马拉博位于比奥科岛上,与大陆部分隔海相望
赤道几内亚拥有丰富的石油资源,人均GDP位居非洲前列
en: Equatorial Guinea is the only sub-Saharan African country with Spanish as an official language
The capital Malabo is located on Bioko Island, separated from the mainland
Equatorial Guinea has abundant oil resources and one of Africa's highest GDPs per capita

description.zh: 几内亚比绍共和国,位于西非,濒临大西洋。几内亚比绍拥有美丽的海岸线和群岛,比热戈斯群岛是联合国教科文组织生物圈保护区。
description.en: The Republic of Guinea-Bissau is located in West Africa, along the Atlantic Ocean. It has a beautiful coastline and archipelago, with the Bijagós Islands designated as a UNESCO Biosphere Reserve.

zh: 比热戈斯群岛是联合国教科文组织生物圈保护区,拥有丰富的海洋生物
几内亚比绍是世界上主要的腰果生产国之一
几内亚比绍拥有独特的克里奥尔文化
