en: The Bijagós Islands are a UNESCO Biosphere Reserve with rich marine biodiversity
Guinea-Bissau is one of the world's major cashew producers
Guinea-Bissau has a unique Creole culture

language.zh: 科摩罗语、阿拉伯语、法语

description.zh: 科摩罗联盟,位于印度洋西部的岛国,由三个主要岛屿组成。科摩罗以其香草、依兰依兰和丁香生产而闻名,被称为'香料群岛'。
description.en: The Union of the Comoros is an island nation in the western Indian Ocean, consisting of three main islands. Comoros is known for its vanilla, ylang-ylang, and clove production, called the 'Spice Islands'.

zh: 科摩罗是世界上最大的依兰依兰精油生产国
科摩罗群岛被称为'香料群岛',盛产香草和丁香
科摩罗是非洲最小的国家之一
en: Comoros is the world's largest producer of ylang-ylang essential oil
The Comoros Islands are called the 'Spice Islands' for their vanilla and cloves
Comoros is one of Africa's smallest countries

description.zh: 利比里亚共和国,位于西非,濒临大西洋。利比里亚由获得自由的美国黑奴于1847年建立,是非洲最古老的共和国之一,国名意为'自由之地'。
description.en: The Republic of Liberia is located in West Africa, along the Atlantic Ocean. Founded in 1847 by freed American slaves, Liberia is one of Africa's oldest republics, with its name meaning 'Land of the Free'.

zh: 利比里亚是非洲最古老的共和国之一,由获得自由的美国黑奴建立
利比里亚的国旗和国徽深受美国影响
利比里亚是世界上主要的船籍登记国之一
en: Liberia is one of Africa's oldest republics, founded by freed American slaves
Liberia's flag and coat of arms are heavily influenced by the United States
Liberia is one of the world's major ship registry countries

description.zh: 莱索托王国,是世界上最大的国中国,完全被南非包围。莱索托是世界上海拔最高的国家,其最低点海拔也超过1400米,被称为'天空之国'。
description.en: The Kingdom of Lesotho is the world's largest enclave, completely surrounded by South Africa. Lesotho is the world's highest-elevation country, with its lowest point above 1,400 meters, called the 'Kingdom in the Sky'.

zh: 莱索托是世界上唯一全境海拔超过1000米的国家
莱索托完全被南非包围,是世界上最大的国中国
莱索托以其优质钻石而闻名,曾出产世界第15大钻石
en: Lesotho is the only country in the world entirely above 1,000 meters elevation
Lesotho is completely surrounded by South Africa, the world's largest enclave
Lesotho is famous for its high-quality diamonds, including the world's 15th-largest diamond

description.zh: 利比亚国,位于北非,拥有地中海最长的海岸线。利比亚拥有丰富的石油资源,是非洲重要的石油生产国。利比亚大部分地区被撒哈拉沙漠覆盖。
description.en: The State of Libya is located in North Africa with the longest Mediterranean coastline. Libya has abundant oil resources and is a major oil producer in Africa. Most of Libya is covered by the Sahara Desert.

zh: 利比亚90%以上的领土被撒哈拉沙漠覆盖
利比亚拥有非洲最大的石油储量
利比亚曾经修建了世界上最大的人工河工程——大人工河
en: Over 90% of Libya is covered by the Sahara Desert
Libya has the largest proven oil reserves in Africa
Libya built the Great Man-Made River, the world's largest irrigation project

description.zh: 马达加斯加共和国,位于印度洋西部,是世界第四大岛国。由于长期的地理隔离,马达加斯加拥有极其丰富的独特生物多样性,90%的物种为岛上特有。
description.en: The Republic of Madagascar is located in the western Indian Ocean and is the world's fourth-largest island. Due to long geographic isolation, Madagascar has exceptionally rich and unique biodiversity, with 90% of species found nowhere else.

zh: 马达加斯加是世界上生物多样性最丰富的地区之一,90%的物种为特有种
马达加斯加是狐猴的唯一原生栖息地
马达加斯加是世界上最大的香草出口国,占全球产量的80%
en: Madagascar is one of the world's biodiversity hotspots, with 90% endemic species
Madagascar is the only natural habitat of lemurs
Madagascar is the world's largest vanilla exporter, producing 80% of global supply

description.zh: 马里共和国,位于西非内陆,是西非面积第二大国。马里拥有悠久的历史,曾是古马里帝国的所在地,以廷巴克图等历史名城闻名。
description.en: The Republic of Mali is a landlocked country in West Africa and the second-largest country in the region. Mali has a rich history, once home to the Mali Empire, famous for historic cities like Timbuktu.

zh: 马里古城廷巴克图曾是非洲重要的学术和贸易中心
马里是非洲第三大黄金生产国
马里的杰内大清真寺是世界上最大的泥砖建筑
en: The ancient city of Timbuktu was a major center of learning and trade in Africa
Mali is the third-largest gold producer in Africa
The Great Mosque of Djenné in Mali is the world's largest mud-brick structure

description.zh: 毛里塔尼亚伊斯兰共和国,位于西非西北部,地跨撒哈拉沙漠和萨赫勒地区。毛里塔尼亚拥有丰富的铁矿资源和渔业资源。
description.en: The Islamic Republic of Mauritania is located in northwestern Africa, spanning the Sahara Desert and Sahel region. Mauritania has rich iron ore deposits and fishing resources.

zh: 毛里塔尼亚是世界上最后几个废除奴隶制的国家之一(1981年)
毛里塔尼亚拥有世界上最长的货运列车之一,长达3公里
毛里塔尼亚90%的国土被沙漠覆盖
en: Mauritania was one of the last countries to abolish slavery (1981)
Mauritania has one of the world's longest trains, up to 3 km long
90% of Mauritania is covered by desert

description.zh: 毛里求斯共和国,位于印度洋西南部,是一个火山岛国。毛里求斯以其美丽的海滩、珊瑚礁和独特的生态系统闻名,是著名的旅游胜地和非洲经济最发达的国家之一。
description.en: The Republic of Mauritius is located in the southwestern Indian Ocean and is a volcanic island nation. Mauritius is famous for its beautiful beaches, coral reefs, and unique ecosystems, making it a popular tourist destination and one of Africa's most developed economies.

zh: 毛里求斯是已灭绝的渡渡鸟的唯一栖息地
毛里求斯是非洲人均GDP最高的国家之一
马克·吐温曾说:'上帝先创造了毛里求斯,再仿照毛里求斯创造了天堂'
en: Mauritius was the only home of the now-extinct dodo bird
Mauritius has one of the highest GDP per capita in Africa
Mark Twain said: 'God created Mauritius first, and then heaven was copied after Mauritius'

description.zh: 马拉维共和国,位于东南非洲的内陆国家。马拉维湖占据该国东部边界,是非洲第三大湖。马拉维以其壮观的自然景观和丰富的淡水鱼类而闻名,被称为'非洲的温暖之心'。
description.en: The Republic of Malawi is a landlocked country in southeastern Africa. Lake Malawi occupies the eastern border and is Africa's third-largest lake. Malawi is known for its spectacular landscapes and abundant freshwater fish, called the 'Warm Heart of Africa'.

zh: 马拉维湖拥有世界上种类最多的淡水鱼,超过1000种
马拉维被称为'非洲的温暖之心',因其人民的友善而闻名
马拉维是世界上人口密度最高的非洲国家之一
en: Lake Malawi has more fish species than any other lake in the world, over 1,000 species
Malawi is called the 'Warm Heart of Africa' for its friendly people
Malawi is one of the most densely populated countries in Africa

description.zh: 纳米比亚共和国,位于非洲西南部,拥有大西洋海岸线。纳米比亚拥有世界上最古老的纳米布沙漠和壮观的鱼河峡谷,以其独特的自然景观和丰富的野生动物而闻名。
description.en: The Republic of Namibia is located in southwestern Africa with an Atlantic coastline. Namibia is home to the world's oldest Namib Desert and the spectacular Fish River Canyon, famous for its unique landscapes and abundant wildlife.

zh: 纳米比亚拥有世界上最古老的沙漠——纳米布沙漠,已有8000万年历史
纳米比亚是世界上人口密度最低的国家之一
纳米比亚的骷髅海岸因众多沉船残骸而闻名
en: Namibia has the world's oldest desert, the Namib Desert, 80 million years old
Namibia is one of the least densely populated countries in the world
Namibia's Skeleton Coast is famous for numerous shipwrecks

description.zh: 尼日尔共和国,位于西非内陆,是世界上最热的国家之一。尼日尔大部分地区被撒哈拉沙漠覆盖,拥有丰富的铀矿资源。
description.en: The Republic of Niger is a landlocked country in West Africa and one of the hottest countries in the world. Most of Niger is covered by the Sahara Desert, and it has rich uranium deposits.

zh: 尼日尔是世界上最热的国家之一,年平均气温超过30°C
尼日尔是世界第五大铀生产国
尼日尔拥有非洲最大的铀矿储量之一
en: Niger is one of the hottest countries in the world, with annual average temperature over 30°C
Niger is the world's fifth-largest uranium producer
Niger has one of Africa's largest uranium reserves

language.zh: 英语、法语、塞舌尔克里奥尔语

description.zh: 塞舌尔共和国,位于印度洋西部,由115个岛屿组成。塞舌尔以其原始的海滩、珊瑚礁和独特的生物多样性而闻名,是世界著名的豪华旅游目的地。
description.en: The Republic of Seychelles is located in the western Indian Ocean, consisting of 115 islands. Seychelles is famous for its pristine beaches, coral reefs, and unique biodiversity, making it a world-renowned luxury tourist destination.

zh: 塞舌尔是非洲最小的国家
塞舌尔拥有世界上最大的海椰子,重达25公斤
塞舌尔是世界上唯一拥有两处联合国教科文组织世界自然遗产的群岛国家
en: Seychelles is the smallest country in Africa
Seychelles has the world's largest seed, the coco de mer, weighing up to 25 kg
Seychelles is the only archipelago nation with two UNESCO World Natural Heritage Sites

description.zh: 苏丹共和国,位于东北非洲,是非洲面积第三大国。苏丹拥有古老的努比亚文明遗址和金字塔,青尼罗河和白尼罗河在首都喀土穆汇合。
description.en: The Republic of Sudan is located in northeastern Africa and is the third-largest country in Africa. Sudan has ancient Nubian civilization sites and pyramids, with the Blue Nile and White Nile converging in the capital Khartoum.

zh: 苏丹拥有的金字塔数量比埃及还多,超过200座
苏丹是古代努比亚文明的发源地
青尼罗河和白尼罗河在苏丹首都喀土穆汇合形成尼罗河
en: Sudan has more pyramids than Egypt, over 200 pyramids
Sudan is the birthplace of the ancient Nubian civilization
The Blue Nile and White Nile merge in Khartoum to form the Nile River

description.zh: 塞拉利昂共和国,位于西非大西洋沿岸。塞拉利昂拥有丰富的钻石和矿产资源,首都弗里敦最初由获释的奴隶建立。
description.en: The Republic of Sierra Leone is located on the Atlantic coast of West Africa. Sierra Leone has rich diamond and mineral resources, and its capital Freetown was originally founded by freed slaves.

zh: 塞拉利昂的首都弗里敦由获释的奴隶建立,意为'自由城'
塞拉利昂曾出产世界第三大钻石'塞拉利昂之星',重969.8克拉
塞拉利昂拥有世界上最大的天然深水港之一
en: Freetown was founded by freed slaves, meaning 'Free Town'
Sierra Leone produced the world's third-largest diamond, the 'Star of Sierra Leone', weighing 969.8 carats
Sierra Leone has one of the world's largest natural deep-water harbors

description.zh: 索马里联邦共和国,位于非洲之角,拥有非洲大陆最长的海岸线。索马里战略位置重要,扼守亚丁湾和印度洋航道。
description.en: The Federal Republic of Somalia is located in the Horn of Africa with the longest coastline on the African continent. Somalia has a strategic location, controlling the Gulf of Aden and Indian Ocean shipping lanes.

zh: 索马里拥有非洲大陆最长的海岸线,超过3300公里
索马里位于'非洲之角',是非洲大陆最东端
索马里是骆驼数量最多的国家之一,骆驼被称为'沙漠之舟'
en: Somalia has the longest coastline in mainland Africa, over 3,300 km
Somalia is located in the 'Horn of Africa', the easternmost point of the continent
Somalia has one of the largest camel populations in the world, called 'ships of the desert'

description.zh: 南苏丹共和国,位于东北非洲,是世界上最年轻的国家,于2011年独立。南苏丹拥有丰富的石油资源和尼罗河流域的广阔湿地。
description.en: The Republic of South Sudan is located in northeastern Africa and is the world's youngest country, gaining independence in 2011. South Sudan has rich oil resources and vast wetlands in the Nile basin.

zh: 南苏丹是世界上最年轻的国家,于2011年7月9日独立
南苏丹拥有非洲最大的湿地系统——苏德沼泽
南苏丹是白尼罗河的主要水源地
en: South Sudan is the world's youngest country, gaining independence on July 9, 2011
South Sudan has Africa's largest wetland system, the Sudd swamp
South Sudan is the main source of the White Nile

currency.zh: 圣多美和普林西比多布拉(STN)

description.zh: 圣多美和普林西比民主共和国,位于几内亚湾,由圣多美岛和普林西比岛组成。这个火山岛国以其可可种植和独特的热带雨林生态系统而闻名。
description.en: The Democratic Republic of São Tomé and Príncipe is located in the Gulf of Guinea, consisting of São Tomé and Príncipe islands. This volcanic island nation is famous for its cocoa cultivation and unique tropical rainforest ecosystems.

zh: 圣多美和普林西比是非洲第二小的国家
圣多美和普林西比是世界上主要的优质可可生产国之一
圣多美和普林西比位于赤道附近,是观察日食的理想地点
en: São Tomé and Príncipe is the second-smallest country in Africa
São Tomé and Príncipe is one of the world's major producers of fine cocoa
Located near the equator, São Tomé and Príncipe is an ideal location for solar eclipse observation

description.zh: 斯威士兰王国(现名埃斯瓦提尼),位于南部非洲,是非洲最后一个绝对君主制国家。斯威士兰以其传统文化节日和自然保护区而闻名。
description.en: The Kingdom of Eswatini (formerly Swaziland) is located in Southern Africa and is Africa's last absolute monarchy. Eswatini is known for its traditional cultural festivals and nature reserves.

zh: 斯威士兰是非洲最后一个绝对君主制国家
斯威士兰于2018年将国名改为埃斯瓦提尼
斯威士兰的芦苇舞节是南部非洲最大的文化活动之一
en: Eswatini is Africa's last absolute monarchy
The country changed its name from Swaziland to Eswatini in 2018
Eswatini's Umhlanga (Reed Dance) is one of Southern Africa's largest cultural events

description.zh: 乍得共和国,位于中非,是非洲第五大国。乍得拥有撒哈拉沙漠、萨赫勒地带和热带草原三种气候带,乍得湖是非洲重要的淡水湖之一。
description.en: The Republic of Chad is located in Central Africa and is the fifth-largest country in Africa. Chad has three climate zones: the Sahara Desert, Sahel, and tropical savanna. Lake Chad is one of Africa's major freshwater lakes.

zh: 乍得是非洲第五大国,但没有海岸线
乍得湖曾是世界第六大湖,但由于气候变化已缩小90%
乍得发现了世界上最古老的原始人类化石之一'撒赫勒人猿'
en: Chad is the fifth-largest country in Africa but is landlocked
Lake Chad was once the world's sixth-largest lake but has shrunk by 90% due to climate change
Chad is where one of the oldest hominid fossils, Sahelanthropus, was discovered

description.zh: 多哥共和国,位于西非,是世界上最狭长的国家之一。多哥拥有美丽的海滩和丰富的磷酸盐矿藏,首都洛美是重要的港口城市。
description.en: The Togolese Republic is located in West Africa and is one of the world's most elongated countries. Togo has beautiful beaches and rich phosphate deposits, with its capital Lomé being an important port city.

zh: 多哥是世界上最狭长的国家之一,南北长约550公里,东西宽仅50-150公里
多哥是世界第五大磷酸盐生产国
多哥的首都洛美拥有西非最大的港口之一
en: Togo is one of the world's most elongated countries, 550 km long but only 50-150 km wide
Togo is the world's fifth-largest phosphate producer
Lomé, Togo's capital, has one of the largest ports in West Africa

description.zh: 赞比亚共和国,位于南部非洲,是一个内陆国家。赞比亚以壮观的维多利亚瀑布、丰富的铜矿资源和众多的国家公园而闻名,是非洲重要的野生动物保护区。
description.en: The Republic of Zambia is located in Southern Africa and is a landlocked country. Zambia is famous for the spectacular Victoria Falls, rich copper deposits, and numerous national parks, making it an important wildlife conservation area in Africa.

zh: 赞比亚拥有世界七大自然奇观之一的维多利亚瀑布
赞比亚是世界第七大铜生产国
赞比亚拥有非洲最大的人工湖之一——卡里巴湖
en: Zambia is home to Victoria Falls, one of the Seven Natural Wonders of the World
Zambia is the world's seventh-largest copper producer
Zambia has Lake Kariba, one of Africa's largest man-made lakes
